name: Solo Shadow Cream-to-Powder Soft Matte Eyeshadow
about: What it is: A buildable, talc-free, cream-to-powder eyeshadow that is easy to use and gives a soft-matte wash of color for all-day wear...Highlighted Ingredients:.-Chamomile and Calendula Extracts: Helps to soothe the eye area..-Magnolia Bark Extract: Helps to smooth the appearance of skin..-Peptides: Helps to reduce the appearance of fine lines...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: This buildable cream-to-powder eyeshadow has a soft-matte finish with zero creasing or fallout. Designed to be applied with your finger or Brush No. 2 (sold separately), the impossible-to-mess-up formula creates a sheer wash of color that can be worn on its own or layered for added depth with all-day lasting power. It is also ophthalmologist tested and approved, safe for contact lens wearers, and safe for sensitive eyes...Clinical Claims: Solo Shadow was tested in a consumer study among 31 volunteers (age ranges from 18-60 years) for two weeks, with time stamps immediately, after eight hours of wear and after the full two week study..100% said Solo Shadow wore for 8 hours or more.100% said Solo shadow did not crease after 8 hours or more.100% agreed the product doesn't settle into fine lines 97% agreed the product is easy to blend...
ingredients: -Chamomile and Calendula extracts: Helps to soothe the eye area..-Magnolia Bark Extract: Helps to smooth the appearance of skin..-Peptides: Helps to reduce the appearance of fine lines...Isododecane, Dimethicone, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Hydrogenated Polycyclopentadiene, Synthetic Wax, Helianthus Annuus Seed Cera [Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Wax], Mica, Silica, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Sh-Polypeptide-123, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Tocopherol, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Magnolia Officinalis Bark Extract, Tin Oxide May Contain (+/-): CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), CI 77491 (Iron Oxides), CI 77492 (Iron Oxides), CI 77499 (Iron Oxides), CI 77742 (Manganese Violet), CI 77007 (Ultramarines), CI 77510 (Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide), CI 42090 (Blue 1 Lake), CI 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), CI 16035 (Red 40 Lake), CI 19140 Yellow 5, CI 77400 (Bronze Powder), CI 77400 (Copper Powder), CI 77000 (Aluminum Powder).....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-For a sheer wash of color, swipe once across the eyelid or layer for more depth..-Blend using Brush No. 2 (sold separately) or your finger..-To close, screw the cap on tightly until you hear a click....Recycling Instructions:.-Separate cap from base, rinse all product out of container, and place in recycling bin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love using this for mocha mousse colored eyelids. $24 is too much but I used my $10 off from points. It is really easy to apply with my fingertips and easy to blend this way. I like to blur a little eyeshadow on top of this afterwards. Definitely planning to pan before 6 months because I donu2019t want it to dry up!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this product, but i just couldnu2019t. It was so dry, i had to dig my finger in to get any sort of product on my finger. No chance in using a brush. I never had issues with the lid coming off, like others have said. It was always just dry from when i first opened.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this product and shade so much, used it every day, it was the perfect no makeup makeup look. But 6 months later it was hard as a rock, dried up. Is this short shelf life due to Merit being a clean brand? Sincerely looking for guidance!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVED this product when I first got it, but it dried out pretty quickly and now is nearly unusable :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Color was not a match very different than online color. Had to return.

reviews.review_title: Daily favorite shadow that's easy but chic
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this shadow. Vachetta is a perfect beige/brown shade that just enhances your eyes. Not tacky, not dry, lasts long. I took 1 star off because it dried up enough for me to want to replace it within a year. I used a good amount (almost daily!) but I was maybe half way done, but it's too stiff I purchased a new one. I'm being careful shutting it really tight this time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Bought online. Just arrived hard as a rock. Canu2019t use. Sad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this eyeshadow but beware of the packaging. The lid wasnu2019t on all the way like I thought and now the product is dried up and hard to use. Wont repurchase because of this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The formula is a nightmare. If you accidentally dip any other color in there, it's stuck in the putty. You can't wipe it away, the formula is like velcro. You have very little play-time with the product before it sets and has a high risk of looking patchy. It dries out over time, even if you close it properly (which feels impossible with this packaging. I had to throw both of mine out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful eyeshadow. Doesnu2019t crease or migrate. Doesnu2019t dry out or irritate my skin. Beautiful color, a little warmer than the photos show. Definitely would buy other shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This shadow exceeded expectations, the depth + the subtlety, the way it goes on so clean and stays on, plus this color - the Social - soft mauve is incredibly beautiful and goes day or night.

reviews.review_title: Perfect for those no make up days
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like Merit products and their eyeshadow.  Very easy to use and provides a subtle color.  Not the best staying power on its own but a good eye primer makes all the difference. If you are looking for bold eye make up this si not the proxy for you. But for those looking for no make up make up, this is perfect!

reviews.review_title: Dried out - only got to use it twice
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Only got to use this a couple times before it dried out completely and is unusable. I donu2019t wear a darker shade of eyeshadow often but the colour was so pretty I wanted to try it. The colour is nice in real life but unless youu2019re planning on using it every day religiously itu2019s not worth the money because it will dry out. I complained to the company and they told me its shelf life is only 6 months. Pretty expensive for what it is and how long it will last.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Didnu2019t really like the application of this product- not very pigmented at all- looked kind of muddy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great eyeshadow, and I love this color for an everyday, easy look. But it has a short shelf life of 6 months. And I didn't get rid of it right at 6 months, but it wasn't as bendable as when it was new. To the point of its easier to just use powder eyeshadow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful cream to matte formula. Easy to work with. A subtle wash of colour; not a huge payoff. The shade SOCIAL is NOT accurate in the photo. It is much more muted and less purple.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Far from clean ingredients, contains synthetic wax and CI77000.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am a clean product freak, some eye shadows are just ok, this product is amazing! In love with how it feels like velvet and how well it stays on most of the day! Will definitely be buying more colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t like this eyeshadow at all. The color is terrible. It doesnu2019t blend properly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty easy to blend and stays put!  Only disappointment is that you have to be REAL careful to make sure the lid clicks when closing.  I didnu2019t realize this with my first one, the lid came off at some point and the cream dried up in my makeup bag.

reviews.review_title: Rich in pigment and packaging! Love #MERIT
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the cream to powder. The color SOCIAL is gorg. Its brings out the green in eyes. I use it as a lipliner as well for cohesive look. I've had it for over a year and no dry out yet. Always make sure you turn it till you hear it click to ensure it doesn't dry out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily, puffy, hooded eyes and struggled finding a way to make shadows work for me. This has been perfect! I just use a finger to apply and then a fluffy brush to blend out. An added benefit is it can hide my tattooed eyeliner! So I can switch up my look when I please! It does crease if you donu2019t let it dry down completely, but itu2019s hardly noticeable on me and Iu2019m always rushing out the door, so I rarely take the time. However, I did test for it and found it to not crease if given the time! Added the picture with creasing just to show it ainu2019t that bad!
Dried out so fast! And even before then it was hard to blend. Great color, but there are much better cream shadows out there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A dryer formula that takes patience blending. In my opinion it's not a great beginner cream shadow, it was difficult to blend and flaked off as I was blending it. Ended up returning it. I love other Merit products but this wasn't for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the color of this shadow and itu2019s perfect for a quick, everyday look. Giving it 4 stars cause I feel like it dries really fast when trying to apply it. Iu2019d apply it and go to blend it more but it was already dry which made it difficult. Like other reviews on here mine also dried fast in its jar

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product needs to be reformulated. Back to the drawing board. The whole pot dries out quickly. No shelf life. Do not waste your money. Merit please do your part as we are interested buyers of your cream matte shadows.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Mine was dry and unable to use. Make sure to check it before you pay for it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is now my go to for my daily eyeshadow look. Blends out beautifully and looks good on its own and with other shadows.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I do love the product but it drys out fast so becomes unusable. Wish they would change the way itu2019s packaged to keep it fresh and soft for the entire duration .

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Lovely until it dries up entirely and gets hard as a rock, unusable!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This came dried out, as if it were an old product. Try as I might it would not blend, not with finger or the recommended brush. Iu2019m not sure if buying directly fm the company would help but super disappointed w thisIu2019m super dis

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Color is not even close to website photos or description. Not cool nor taupe. Warm and rosie instead. Returning without using. Hope to try the formula if/when more colors are released.

reviews.review_title: Trick to keep these from drying out
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a soft purple that is lovely on the skin. The trick to not having it dry out is to put a few drops of Argan or Jojoba oil on top of the product if youu2019re not using it for at least a few days. It sinks in and keeps it from drying out.

reviews.review_title: Was loved until it dried out
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this eyeshadow.  Perfect shade.  However, even with being conscious of making sure it was locked, it still dried out after several months.  Hugely disappointing!  I would not recommend.

reviews.review_title: Looks like a grey bruise on me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am blue-eyed with very fair, light skin and my veins/undereyes look distinctly blue through my pale skin. Because of my complexion, I tend to gravitate towards warm-toned cosmetics. When I used the Brun eyeshadow, which is supposed to be a warm brown, it actually appeared like a grey-purple bruise on my eyelids. I'm not sure why the pigment is so different than in the picture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have several of these shadows. They are creamy and easy to use with nothing more than your finger. They blend very easily.  For ladies who want that pop of color without looking ridiculous, these colors are very pretty. They won't dry out if you close the lid properly!!

reviews.review_title: NOT PLUM or mauve or anything but basic brown
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased the colour Social, claims to be soft mauve but is actually brown. So disappointed.  Will return.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: PIECE OF CRAP PRODUCT, dried up within a few months and now is completely useless

reviews.review_title: Great color.  Dries up too fast.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the color. Loved the matte look. It dried up after 4 months. (Even made sure the lid clicked shut) If itu2019s something you will use every single day and never change up your palette, Iu2019d say itu2019s great and worth the money.

The worst eyeshadow ever!  Used it once and when I went to use again it was all cracked and dried upu2026as it was past the 60 days return policy , Sephora would not help me at all..do not buy!!! Product is faulty

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It's completely dried, this product is a scam. You should refund the money back to everyone who got this useless product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Dries out super fast. I bought four of them and all dried out because I canu2019t use them fast enough. Wondering if Sephora will accept a return? Loved at first but so disappointed in the lasting effect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dries up instantly. Canu2019t blend this on my eye for the life of me. Iu2019m thinking this is a return for me, please donu2019t buy this. Itu2019s not going to give you what you are looking for unfortunately.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Color is so pretty but it Dried out a little quickly. I had a hard time applying it

reviews.review_title: Dry Out Fast! Colours Are Not As Shown.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So disappointed! Social looks nothing like the pictures. It is closer to a slightly pinky nude and is no where near a purple nor plum colour. It's very close to Studio in colour which I also own. Do not buy more than 1, maximum 2, of these at a time as they dry out so fast it isn't funny. I used Social twice and it dried out. When this product is new it goes on nice and creamy and doesn't crease. The colours are very flat and matte though I usually have to add some sparkle on top of them so they don't look so basic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Bought two of these and after few months they both are dry and hard as a rock. Not worth it. What am I suppose to do with it now?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I feel like the company must have changed this.color. The beautiful plum in the ads is not what you get on the pot. It is a much softer lavender that isnu2019t flattering on my skin tone.

reviews.review_title: Not for intermittent use - dried quickly and waste
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have 3 colors studio viper and mauve and my review is the same for all of three. When you first get this product itu2019s great but must work fast with the product. Stick to one color you plan to get a lot of use out of. This will dry up and it does so in months

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! It does not settle into my eyelid creases. It goes on smoothly and stays put all day. My new favorite eye shadow! I am obsessed!  The photo I took was after a 10 hour work day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Do not buy this product. Dried up within months and I only got to use it one or two times. I reached out to customer service and they said this was normal so they couldnu2019t replace or refund me but offered a 10% discount on my next order. Pass! I wonu2019t be buying any more of their bad quality overpriced makeup. Bad customer service and bad product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Color is beautiful but didnu2019t blend that well and didnu2019t have any staying power

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This was difficult to blend.  I used my finger, then when that didnu2019t work, I used a stiff? shirt stubby eyeshadow brush.  Still didnu2019t blend.  Returned.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product dried out so quickly making it impossible to use. There are way better cream eyeshadows out there that have way longer longevity.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice color and nice packaging but product came bone dry. This is not a one step eyeshadow routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the texture - it is super creamy. I had expected the color (Social) to be sort of plum based on the image or, as it was described, a mauve, but in reality it was a matte nude color. If I had known I probably would not have purchased, but I'm keeping it because honestly it looks alright. Do not buy this expecting any purple tint though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the color - I have both Viper and Brun - but itu2019s very creasy and wears off quickly. I have oily eyelids so I make sure to use a primer beforehand, but it doesnu2019t help at all. Unfortunate, cause I really the overall concept.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is horrendous as an eyeshadow (see all the pics from real accounts) but it makes a pretty diffused soft eyeliner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really love this earthy taupe colour. I find you have to blend it quickly as it dries down to a powder-like formula rather soon after applying to the lid. But so far, so good! Iu2019ve seen other reviews saying that it dries out overtime, so Iu2019ll be keeping an eye out for that with my current pot. Also, you can definitely build this up for the colour to appear more vibrant. I didnu2019t go heavy with the application as I like my eyeshadow to appear more subtle, but it definitely can be intensified by utilizing more of the product :)  **P.S. I actually purchased this product with MY OWN money!!! This is not a product I received for free to review like so many of the other reviews on Sephora products (which I believe ruins the whole purpose of reviews since more often than not people are going to submit biased opinions when they receive a product for free) u2728ud83dude0c

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As other reviewers said it dries out pretty quickly, the color was nice for a month or two, but now it is impossible to apply as it dried out

reviews.review_title: Dries up and becomes unusable very quickly
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the color of this eyeshadow and it was very creamy and easy to use when I first received it. However, as many others have noted, it quickly dried up to an unusable lump of waxy clay, impossible to use with a brush, or your fingers, and unable to be softened. I contacted the company and they told me there is a 6 month expiration on this product.

reviews.review_title: A must-have in my daily routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful product. I love the color and texture - a very easy creamy application and stays on all day.  I have been using this for over 6 months and have not had an issue with the drying that some people talk about. The cap does have a strong click that you need to make sure is closed to ensure it doesnu2019t dry out. This makes it a little more challenging to open/close, but when you do it right, it keeps the product fresh freally well, which is well worth the inconvenience!

reviews.review_title: Pass on this one - dry dry dry!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really didn't like this eyeshadow. It dries INSTANTLY, no time to blend it out. The color in the product photo also couldn't be more misleading - who approved that?? I really don't understand the hype, honestly. Go try the Laura Mercier Caviar sticks instead.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I liked it for the first few weeks that it worked. It dried out despite being seal shut. I took off the top layer then could use it a bit again. But itu2019s not worth the money

reviews.review_title: Dried up a month after opening
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product dried up after a month of use and is now useless. For the price, this is a letdown.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product has a nice formulation but the color is whatu2019s throwing me off. I got the u201ccool taupeu201d shade but it pulls warm/peachy on me. I have fair-light skin with a neutral undertone. Not sure about the other shades but this one isnu2019t it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this at first but it only lasted a couple months before it hardened to an unusable wax consistency. Ugh!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty color but extremely dry. It creased even when I tried with primer. Disappointed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Instead of using as a shadow, I brush this into my eyelash line, and then swipe over upper & lower lashes to darken them instead of using liner. It gives a softer look than traditional liners. I took off two stars because the product always dries out within a month even though I diligently make sure the cap is tightly shut after every use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous! Really nice texture and pretty easy to use for every day.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful color but be prepared to fuss with cap
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I like the color and texture of this eyeshadow. Goes on creamy and smooth and has decent staying power. However, I hate the packaging. To close the cap, it has to be lined up just right so that it clicks when you turn it. I've had this for over a month and it takes me at least 3 tries each morning to get it to click. Once it did not click all the way making it susceptible to drying out. When I am in a rush in the morning, I won't use this b/c I don't have the time to fuss with the cap and I don't want to risk it drying out. Unscrewing the cap to open is also sometimes a challenge. I would not recommend for anyone with arthritis. Why can't they make a normal screw on cap like other cream eye shadow pots?

reviews.review_title: Wanted so badly to love it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this productu2014it has beautiful packaging and I love the idea of using it with the dual sided brush. But as others said here, it dried up within the first month.  I kept the lid tightly closed the entire time when it wasnu2019t in use. I tried to make it last for another month, but it became harder and harder to get any product out of it and it started coming out in chunks and flaking on my skin. I love Meritu2019s other products, but for the price, I have a hard time justifying purchasing an eyeshadow that lasts less than 1 month.

reviews.review_title: Poor quality - only 4 months long shelf life.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I do not recommend this product at all. Purchased end of June and it is already dried out and cracked in half ( less than 5 months ).  Very poor quality and definitely not worth the price tag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought both the Midcentury and Vachetta through the Merit site and both dried out so quickly. Color was nice while it lasted, but I barely got to use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Cream-to-Powder delivers what it says. However, Vachetta is just an u201coffu201d shade. Will not purchase that color again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the product and this color. Stays put and very pigmented.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the product but will not repurchase this color again.   It just wasnu2019t my shade. Itu2019s very pigmented and stays put all day. Definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect for beginners for an easy buildable Smokey eye look. Doesnu2019t dry out fast either sooo good

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Olive skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the colors  and ease of use with these cream shadows. I bought 2 of them just a few months ago, and unfortunately, they are already dried out. The tan shade has a split going through the center of it and the gray is dried out to the point where it feels like I'm applying putty. For this reason I can't recommend $24 a pop for just a few months of use. I will stick with shadow sticks and Mac Paint Pots going forward.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this shadow but mine dried out, it is cracked and rock hard

reviews.review_title: Not worth it. Dry's out as fast as everyone says
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I first got this eyeshadow I found it hard apply. Then I got the brush that goes with it, total game changer. BUT like everyone else says, it dries out so fast. reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: TLDR; if you are looking for a super easy way to incorporate eyeshadow into your daily look without adding a bunch of time to your makeup routine, this is a really great product!  As someone who loves eyeshadow looks that are effortless and refined, I really like this cream shadow. I bought the shade Midcentury and I plan on picking up more; I use it as a base for the easiest 2-3 step eye look ever.  With the product on my finger tip, I concentrate it on my eyelid starting in the outer corner and working my way in, then feather it out into my crease and tap it out with the remaining product. They blend so easily, it hardly takes any work.  I layer any shimmer shadow over it that Iu2019m feeling that day, itu2019s so versatile and allows me to switch up my daily look without switching up my routine and taking more time to get ready in the morning.  Itu2019s also SUPER long wearing. I used to never wear eyeshadow to work because it took forever to blend everything out and wouldnu2019t last through the entire shift, but this allows me to have a finished eyeshadow look in less than five minutes that lasts all day long, Iu2019m talking 12+ hours.  Hereu2019s my only gripe, and itu2019s a small one but I have a hunch it may affect the shelf life of the product: since it sets so quickly from a cream to a powder finish, it also dries up pretty quickly in the pot. It leaves little crumblies behind and Iu2019m worried that as I use the product more and it gets more exposure to air, the texture will change and I wonu2019t be able to get through the whole pot without it drying up. This isnu2019t a real problem that Iu2019ve encountered yet, but I wanted to throw it in here.  I also canu2019t use this product with my fan on because it will dry on my finger before I can blend it out fully and get patchy, so I turn my fan off when Iu2019m applying this, but thatu2019s also the case with most of my eye makeup like my mascara and eyeliner so thatu2019s not that big a deal.

Perfect for work or quick run to the store to give you a little oomph. I donu2019t find that these dry out. I have Studio, Vaccheta and the purple one. All still creamy and soft after several months of owning them. Great base for eye u201clooksu201d as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Bottom line: Recommend for natural looks and fair skin.  I have very pale redhead skin and eyeshadow can look clownish very easily. Vachetta is not a unique color, but it is more blendable and sheer than most other eyeshadows and it has a slight sheen that kallows it to look natural. I apply it in awing then blend inward for an easy graduated wash and then pick up a tiny bit on a brush and use it as a liner on the outer 1/4 corners bottom and top the. blend. The jar is fairly large and I expect it to easily last two years. The formula is unscented and cruelty-free and seems sensitive skin friendly so far. I might even try the plum color. If youu2019re in doubt, give it a try.

reviews.review_title: Subtle but visible color & good quality
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using cream shadows for many years, from many brands & this is one of the best for the application, color depth, and longevity which meets my standards.  I also have the cool taupe Studio and both Studio & Social met my desire to create a shadow - not a painted eyelid (which is also fun) but a subtle shadow to enhance my eyes.  If you prefer to blend & play with eyeshadow colors for 10 minutes, this may set a little too fast for that but I dab it on, blend a little, add more when needed in about as much time as it took for me to write that, and I'm good.  In my experience, darker colors in cream shadow can be very patchy & hard to work with.  Neither Social nor Studio are dark so I cannot speak to others' frustrating experiences with this brand.  Longevity is excellent and I've seen no creasing (without primer).

If youu2019re still into eyeshadow, the value isnu2019t there for you, but if you want one and done, then this is it. I didnu2019t find it set down too quickly, i was able to blend. I didnu2019t using primer and it was perfectly fine and did not crease, first time ever. I donu2019t have oily lids but do have hooded eyes.

It has to click.  Itu2019s very awkward. I keep thinking about people with dexterity issuesu2026this would be difficult to open and to close.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had been interested in this product prior to it's release but due to all the negative feedback on social media, I decided to not purchase. Went to Sephora a few weeks ago and because I was still intrigued, I decided to grab the shade social. Not every product is for everyone but this product/shade has been amazing for me. I apply a light wash of color with a medium eye shadow brush and add a bit more product to the outer lid for some depth. The color in the pot is somewhat deceiving but It lasts all day on my oily eyelids. I will definetly be grabbing more shades.

reviews.review_title: Lovely eyeshadow, terrible packaging for the price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Nice eyeshadow. Goes on well and Social is a beautiful color, especially for hazel eyes. Stayed pretty good throughout the day. Packaging is very very cheap feeling. The lid is very fragile feeling plastic .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this really lives up to the name, one problem i was having with my other cream eye shadows was the creasing at the end of day but this one holds its groundu2026 i layer space cowboy over it and its *chefu2019s kiss*

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ooo this is lovely. Iu2019ve been trying a lot of brown-ish cream eyeshadow and Midcentury is a beautiful natural looking eye look. I think the formula is nice and itu2019s pretty easy to blend.

reviews.review_title: Makes my life much easier! But this is not taupe
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: All the Youtubers swear by this formula. I didnt really want to spend this much $ on a single but nothing else is working for my aging greasy eyelids. I'm SO happy with this product. you can use the thinnest amount and sheer it out for a subtle wash... and somehow it is perfectly blended every time. You can also build it as much as you want and it magically blends.   Caution: I have light skin with yellow undertones (Kosas concealer 2W or 2.3) and this eye shadow shade in Studio is flaming PEACH on me. No taupe in sight. its not cool either -- it's a warmish-neutral peachy beige.  I with Merit would make some muddier nuanced neutrals. So now I'm buying Nelson the grey one to hopefully achieve a taupe by mixing the tones.   ZERO CREASING, ZERO TEXTURE on my aging greasy eyes. Although you can see some texture in my photo. This is because I found that if I build up multiple light layers it will show more texture. Where as if I just apply what I need from the get-go, it dries down with no texture.   Life-changing formula!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve only had it a week ish so I canu2019t speak to it drying out. I absolutely love it so far. Smooth and wears all day. Natural looking and beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The perfect non-eyeshadow eyeshadow for us girls who donu2019t know how. It looks darker in the pan but itu2019s a perfect u201cbarely thereu201d touch to add definition to the eyes, so much so I donu2019t wear eyeliner daily anymore.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Awful formula.  Super dry.  The product in the pot is dry and hard like a brick, even though I made sure to close the lid tightly after each use.  The product is so dry/hard that it's impossible to pick it up with a brush.  Using fingers to heat it up somewhat warms up the product and softens it but it creases almost immediately when I try to rub it onto my lids.  Just a terrible, terrible formula that's so badly executed.  I know what they're going for, but this is not it.  I recommend Bobbi Brown's single eyeshadows if you're still trying to achieve that matte, subtly smoky 90s shadow look.  I rarely write reviews, but this product is so bad that it's shocking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved it in the beginning. I have only had it a couple months and it got dry. I would not purchase again. They might need to think of a new packaging to keep it from drying out so quickly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cream to shadow powder! Hope it doesn't dry out in a few months like other posters have written. Also, the color Vachetta that I got is much darker than what is pictured but I'm not complaining. I give it one swipe on the eyelids and I'm done. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, notSure skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This produce in the shade studio is my go to everyday eyeshadow. Itu2019s really subtle and natural and creates the perfect amount of shadow behind my lashes. The application is super easy and it dries down quickly and doesnu2019t smudge. I love that it dries down to a powder finish which allows it to feel lightweight on my eyes. My only complaint is that I wish they had more shades to choose from.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got Nelson and Social. social applies like a neutral brown on with hint of purple maybe. I like how easy it is to apply you could use your finger, not a fan of their brush. It dries down quickly but the colour fades from your eyes quite quickly. I come back an hour or two later and it looks like I no longer have anything on my eyes no matter how dark I build up the colour. Love the concept but needs longevity

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Loved it for the first couple months, but it dried out after 6 months. I live in Hawaii and its a super humid environment. Would probably not buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The color Social is different from this one pictured. I don't like the formula and again I'm disappointed. Merit is not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m so sad I really loved this product but after a couple months it completely dried out like a few other reviews have showed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing one and done shadow. Doesnu2019t crease on my mature eyes and makes blue eyes pop. Wears all day. Really love this. Also lid clicks closed to make sure it is secure and doesnu2019t dry out. Nice touch.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not as purple as it appears in this image. I have almost every color.  These shadows are incredible.  Highly recommend getting the brush they sell with it.  10/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like to look good but don't wear a ton of make up nor do I want to spend 1+ hours putting my make up on so my routine mostly consists of products that I can apply with my fingers (e.g., Merit or Westman Atelier concealer stick, Merit cream blush) AND isn't liquid so I don't have to put it in my liquids bag when I fly. When I saw this product I thought this would be a great addition to my make up stash but after the reviews about how the product dries out, I went to my local Sephora to try it out and thank you to the reviewers for their honest opinion! I tried out Nelson and it was such a soft yet edgy gray color but when I tried to apply it it was rock hard and what I was able to scrape off, it applied so patchy. This product might work for those who wear eyeshadow often and finish the product quickly but for an occasional wearer, try either the Armani or Ilia.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m going to need Merit to release a bunch more shades in this formula. If I had a paler shade closer to my skin tone to use as a base it would be a game changer. Would love more cool tones. This shadow wears like iron. My lids get oily and are slightly hooded and yet these still donu2019t crease.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Really nice color! Easy to use and stays well. I would but more colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love these shadows. The formula does not crease and does not dry out on the lids. Great for a single easy wash of color. Mid century is great for brown eyes. You can build it up too. I apply with a mini beauty blender and it blends it out perfectly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great creme eyeshadow. Hard to find navy(less harsh than black).

reviews.review_title: Not suitable for my oily eyelids
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately this one was returned. After a few hours it disappeared from my oily eyelids all together. It blended out easily and the color was lovely, however.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Genuinely obsessed with this and confused why so many people said it dried out easily u2014 maybe itu2019s because im on the east coast which is somewhat humid, or maybe because people arenu2019t checking that they clicked it all the way closed?  Because there is a bit of weirdness to getting it all the way closed. But idk Iu2019m obsessed, it stays so well, is just enough color but is buildable, and the brush they sell for it is incredible too. I bought the lilac color (social) and immediately bought burn too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Nelson, nice dramatic color or use as liner...

Store away from heat/light/moisture/etc. I own other similar products and you have to pay attention to how you put away and store the product.

BUT - both times I've used it, I've gotten terrible reactions the next day on my eyelids, and the reaction lasted in the first case for over a month. Peeling, itchy, scaly, and red. I tried it again and same thing. I've never had a reaction like this to any other product that I've put on my eyelids.

reviews.review_title: Perfect color and easy to use.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a fabulous creme shadow. It's fab because it won't set in crease or dissolve into a big blob of brown mush. This is why it's a staple in my drawer, makeup kit, and friends' make-up bags.  Number one, it's a smooth and complimentary color. It's natural and has a hint of red that will make your blue or green eyes pop! It's also a great base color for those who say,  I want to look  natural and just got out of bed looking like this days. It can even ward off discoloration from your lid, which, as you get older, can have a green/bluish tint. Remember, girls, Red tones counter any ash and green. This looks great on those over 40 and up. It's so easy you can use your fingers.  It's an obvious repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have hooded eyes, and while this product is so pretty when first applied, I find that for me it creases pretty significantly after an hour or so. The color is beautiful, I wish I could get it to stay without moving. Even powders and eye primers have not helped.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_title: Returning Not a Cool Toned Color
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I will be returning this product or rather exchanging it for different color. I love the formula. Itu2019s great as a one and done shadow but the color is not cool at all in my opinion. I have cool leaning light skin and it looks like an orange brown on me, not a cool taupe at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Nelson is a soft and neutral grey. I'm surprised it looks so nice on me because I avoid dark eyeshadows. I prefer a wash of color with a little smokiness on my outside corners of my eyes. Can intensify with multiple layers and a charcoal eyeliner or sparkle topper. For best results, understand the formula. I use the dense Merit eyeshadow brush. (The bristles are a little stiffer than for a powder eyeshadow.) Soft brushes do not work as well. Let the eyeshadow set for a minute before building layers or else patchiness can occur. These are very similar to MAC Pots, but not as robust, and easier to feather. You might need to wash your brush more often with this shadow, but I prefer the no budge formula. Finally, my eyelids are oily, but I haven't experienced creasing unlike others mention, so YMMV.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was hoping this product would be a one and done for me. Unfortunately, if I use a small amount of this product it creases up horribly. It only has staying power for me if I use a TON of it. Then my eyelid looks caked with product. Itu2019s not oily lid approved.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

My only complain is that the lis can be a bit hard to take on and off, especially right after moisturizing or priming your face woth your hands. Otherwise, I love it!

reviews.review_title: Perfect addition to my minimalist makeup
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a minimalist makeup girlie. I typically just wear a tinted SPF and a stain/gloss on the lips, and I've been wanting to try a single eyeshadow that would enhance my features slightly for everyday that isn't as fussy as eyeliner or as uncomfortable as mascara. This eyeshadow is perfect for that. The shadow is slightly darker than my skintone, and the warm/orangey tint looks beautiful on, and really makes my eyes pop. I love that it is a cream shadow, though the packaging is a little tough to navigate - definitely be sure that you hear the click when you close it so that it doesn't dry-out.

I donu2019t see creasing when I wear it alone. I am definitely going to try more shades. The picture are screenshots from a video where I used this shadow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wasn't sure what to expect since people seem to either love or hate these.  I was pleasantly surprised by how nice the colour is and also the longevity once on. You do need to work fast- so one eye at a time to blend these out but they provide a really love wash of colour.  I no longer fuss with eyeshadows and have very textured eyelids and these work really well for me. I will say however, that Vachetta did not show up at all on my light/medium skin (eyelids might be a bit darker) but midcentury is so beautiful-the loveliest warm brown. I also have Social and was hoping it would blend to a light purple/lavender but on my warm skin, it looks more like a grey/taupe colour.  Worth it if you're happy with a simple wash of colour. I bought the brush with this and it works well with these but isn't necessary

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: Incredibly dry and patchy. Plus Iu2019ve only had this eyeshadow since October and itu2019s already completely dried out in the container. Iu2019ve worn it twice. Never purchasing again and have told friends to avoid.

reviews.review_title: Very smooth and easy to use
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Got this as shade close to my skin tone for no makeup days to cover my discoloration on my eye lids a bit. Very easy to use and has a satin matte finish. Creases a little but I donu2019t set it so itu2019s expected

Btw, work fairly quickly or this will set.

reviews.review_title: Great u201c1 and doneu201d for mature eyes
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am 56yo and was looking for a soft one-and-done eye product. I saw this on social media and decided to give it a try. I was extremely happy with how it performed. A little dab on a soft brush and it blended on the whole lid beautifully. I used a primer and the shadow lasted for 8 hours without creasing or wearing away. After that there was a tiny bit of creasing in my inner eyelid. I definitely recommend this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this eyeshadow! I don't apply any eye shadow primer, it looks good, and stays put throughout the day. Fast and easy to apply! Definitely my go to product!! Will be buying more colors.

reviews.review_title: NO neutral (non orangey) shades for pale skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the idea of a cream to powder eyeshadow but there's a fine line between going on smooth and turning cakey. There's no way to lawyer two colors or it will for sure get cakey. ALSO the colors are a huge issue as I tried every single brown and NONE looked like a nice neutral brown as they ALL looked very orangey! I am very fair and notice that many products that claim to be neutral look orange (example; CT Pillowtalk---totally orange on my lips!) and it's frustrating! I wish the formula was a bit more forgiving in application and that they'd come up with some decent neutral browns, taupes, etc.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Color is way off. More of an orangey brown. Hard to apply as well and no staying power. Returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the product! Agree that packaging is a bit fiddly but well worth it. Have purchased three shades and the only one I don't love is Social because I wouldn't call it a mauve, I'd say it's a brown with a mauve tinge. I use Studio all the time and it's renewed my love of eyeshadow!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Color: Social... This mauve looked really grey on my skin and didn't have much pigment. It's the only color I have tried and although I prefer a modest/muted lid, this was a bit too modest/muted and like I mentioned, leaned more grey on my eye.

reviews.review_title: Would love it if it was actually cool taupe
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the formula but I bought cool taupe and it is definitely orange. It reminds me of the Rare Beauty liquid eyeshadow in u2018nearly neutralu2019 which is also a warm toned shade. I did not need both.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is terrible. Clever marketing but you will waste your money. It dries out in the container making it unusable. You cannot apply it on clean eyelids, so much for cream product. You need something to help it  product glide.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Social is a very wearable color but much more brown than plum in real life so I took a star away for the discrepancy. It doesn't go on too dark which is nice; you can swipe with your finger and not worry about precision. I don't use primer but it can last through a nap, and after a full day there's only a little creasing.   I took away a full star for the god-awful packaging. The lid is terrible!! There's some kind of locking mechanism but no indicator to tell you when it's lined up so you have to just keep trying til it feels like it should break. The lid itself is so thin and slippery that it's a struggle every time, both opening and closing. I've never used anything so annoying.  Overall, a nice shadow but nothing extraordinary.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Doesnu2019t really stay put, difficult to blend, and the color is oddly orangey. I ordered Midcentury, hoping for a one and done brown. Unfortunately I just canu2019t get it to look anything but patchy and orange.
Cu2019est vrai quu2019il seche assez vite, mais il nu2019est pas vraiment fait pour faire des looks complexes qui necessite du temps et du blending! Cu2019est un parfait go-to pour tous les jours!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved it the first two weeks but then it's dried out and now just looks crumbly when I use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

I used it the way the videos show, i used it with a blending brush and with my fingers. None of the ways worked. I don't think it's worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Never written a review before but had to say something because their marketing is CONVINCING. This eyeshadow is terrible, hard to use, doesnu2019t blend, doesnu2019t budge (a good thing but makes it even harder to use when it dries completely after .2secs) and itu2019s PATCHY. Maybe the light colors can get away with it but with the darker colors you can see everything and itu2019s uneven, trust. Even a Sephora employee disclosed to me itu2019s the most returned product sheu2019s seen in a while and her and her coworkers all think itu2019s a horrible, hard to use product. They also donu2019t know how theyu2019ve convinced so many people otherwise. Needless to say after 4 attempts to make it look good I will be returning.

reviews.review_title: Best eye shadow I've ever tried!

I also love the Midcentury shade on my medium-tan skin. it looks so natural and it's a great shade to wear to work. I wish they came out with more neutral/causal shade options.

reviews.review_title: Cute item to have in your purse for on the go

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin

I also like how the lid clicks shut so you know itu2019s fully closed so it wonu2019t dry out. On the flip side, this feature can make it a little hard to twist open. (The lid is short and hard to grip.) I will likely try more colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

The fact that itu2019s ophthalmologist-tested and safe for sensitive eyes or contact lens wearers adds to its appeal. Overall, Solo Shadow is a go-to choice for an effortless, versatile, and eye-friendly makeup experience.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I just used Midcentury for the first time today, and my contact lens wearing eyes are loving it. It is creamy, easty to apply, buildable (had to add a bit more to get the payoff I wanted) and is very comfortable. Seems to wear well. Feels interesting because it doesn't dry to a powder....stays creamy feeling on lids. This is a very warm brown shade....once built up, the tone looks deeper on my fair skin than on the fair skinned model in the photos. Took me a minute to figure out how to get the cap off....then to close it you have to force it til you hear a click....I guess this is to prevent product from drying out. Definitely will go back for another shade. Took 1 star off for price as I believe this product could be priced lower (seems like a shallow pan...most of weight seems to be packaging, which is elevated looking). My first foray into Merit was successful. Thank you Sephora!

reviews.review_title: Amazing colors and finish, but difficult to use
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't know how to accurately rate this product b/c the colors are OUTSTANDING. They are simply gorgeous, and I have not tried the darkest shades, but I have almost all of the lighter ones, and they each look so beautiful and seem almost like a natural-esque contour for my eyes.......they just so beautifully enhance them (I am a light-medium neutral in foundation colors.......leaning more cool than neutral........with dark brown eyes and super dark brown hair). The only downside and the reason why I've rated this much lower than I would normally have is that you have to work lightening quick with this product or it dries down and you are unable to move it around at all unless you wait a good 30 minutes or so until your eyelids heat up and make application more pliable again, and then it becomes patchy at best. It is THAT EXTREMELY difficult to apply, but if you are working at the speed of sound and are able to blend your heart out and really work this product in you will be rewarded with one of the most satisfying makeup products I have come across in years. This really is a Sophie's choice situation for me people, but I have to be honest and state that yes, if you have drier lids this may not work for you, and if you want to add layers of shadows this may not work for you, but something I really wish to emphasize is that nobody seems to give vachetta a real shot.............try it..............you will be rewarded. Especially if you are my skin tone........Vachetta becomes the most gorgeous no makeup look that makes me look polished, and I apply it all over, and I would have NEVER gone near this color except that it was the only one they had available in store, and once I tried this I went in deep and tested the other shades and purchased Midcentury, Burn, and Social.................and Social is another chef's kiss color...........you need to try these, but be aware of how difficult they are to use.

reviews.review_text: I love it, but I also donu2019t. Not sure how I feel about this product lol. You definitely have to move quickly when you blend it. It is easy to work with for beginners or someone who doesnu2019t have a lot of time getting ready.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Nice color but ineffective & patchy on hooded eyes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Easily the worst eyeshadows I have ever used. Particularly Viper. Do. Not. Buy. Viper. Or any of the dark shades. Iu2019ve tried them all. They lift up on themselves, are incredibly patchy, and gather in any texture whatsoever. You can not blend, it will get patchy. You can not build, the color gets even more patchy with bald spot galore. The darker shades are beyond horrible.   The other two I have (Midcentury and Social) are manageable. Up close, they are absolutely still patchy, but being lighter shades, it isnu2019t as noticeable. These also enhance texture. If you have maturing lids, avoid. They dry so fast that you have no working time. That caused the product to dry on your brush or finger which is partially the cause of them getting patchy. The dry product on your lid lifts up on the dry stuff on your brush or fingers. I can not overstate how bad these are.  The only nice thing I have to say about them is that I like the three colors I have. Thatu2019s it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought studio and vachetta and Iu2019m obsessed. They are so creamy, apply really easily, and blend well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When this launched, I purchased Brun, and it became my favourite everyday eyeshadow. On my lids (mildly oily, but I don't prime or prep my lids at all) it layers beautifully - I can use it as a gorgeous wash of colour or layer it up for something deeper - and lasts long. I've had my eyes on Viper for a while, as it was consistently sold out in stores. I bit the bullet and ordered it online during the VIB Rouge sale period. Unfortunately, this shade's not working like Brun - it's patchy, and doesn't seem to blend or layer as effortlessly. I considered prepping my lids differently, but given I never do that with Brun, and the extra steps seem counter to Merit's marketing...this one will be going back.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Was very excited to try this new product. Used with and with out primer. Did not last. Wore off after a few hours of wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this! Easy to use, pigmented and lasts all day. Can't wait to try more colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The formula is good, it performs as claimed, and the colors are pretty. But for a brand that markets themselves as being simple and easy, this was a miss because of the packing. Itu2019s nearly impossible to unscrew the lid once itu2019s locked on. If you have any concerns about mobility in your hands, or maybe even clammy hands, donu2019t waste your money. Iu2019ve spent more time cursing this packaging than using the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really nice product. The shade is gorgeous on my skin tone. The formula does not budge. Recommend doing one eye at a time because you only have a little time to blend before it will not move. Only reason for 4 stars vs 5 is cause it is a pretty dry formula and i worry how long it will last before it completely dries out

reviews.review_title: This is a great eyeshadow! But not perfect
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First off - the product photo for Social needs to be updated!! The pan photo shows it so dark, where as the swatch photos show it a lighter purple. Where in reality it is more of a true mauve with cool pinky/brown undertones.  I wanted this product for a one and done look. And I was able to achieve this, with a bit of a learning curve at first.  I applied it with my fingers and it went on smooth and I could easily diffuse it with my fingers alone. The product on its own did crease and move a bit after around 5 hours. However when I tried it again using an eyeshadow primer (Milani eyeshadow primer) I got nearly 8 hours of wear.   I had some issues with building up the colour of the product at first. And found that I needed to have it fully dry down before adding another layer or it would get patchy.   But overall - I am able to swipe this on quickly in the mornings and have that perfect minimalist look! It is a lot of product for the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first time I tried out eyeshadow from Merit. The formula is creamy, buildable and easy to work with. Only thing I wish is for the color payoff to be a little bolder.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product spoke to me, I had to have it lol. I really wanted studio but it's been sold out so I got Vachetta instead. I'm happy I got it, I get why folks are frustrated with the packaging, the lid is finicky, it needs to be turned until it clicks or the lid just falls off. I used the rare beauty eyeshadow brush and it seems easier to work with than my fingers, at least for blending out the edges. I'm not sure where the mixed reviews are coming from, maybe different colors are affecting the formula but I had no issues with creasing or patchiness, it's just a beautiful cream formula that doesn't dry down too fast, some creams dry so fast you can't blend them out, this one isn't like that.. but once it does dry that baby don't budge all day. It can be a wash of all over color or a perfect base for powder. I hope to get more colors before the sale ends! Please restock!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the driest cream shadow I have ever had the displeasure of using. I was already annoyed with the texture, but itu2019s also impossible to work with. My first swipe, I realized I didnu2019t have enough product so I tried to layer on more and it became a clumpy mess. So disappointed  On some more and

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful cream shadow.  Easy to apply, dries down nicely, not patchy and long lasting.  On me, does not crease.  Would try in other colours.  Taking off one star due to packaging.  Packaging is attractive but the lid can be difficult to twist back on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loveeee cream eyeshadows but this missed the mark for me. Color is pretty but it creased, cracked, and chipped off Manettau2019s after a few hours. The oackagain was also annoying. Try R.E.M or about face instead

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been eyeing this product for months but I put off trying it because of some of the mixed reviews I read. I finally decided to pick this up on the shade Social during the sale and I love it! I donu2019t wear a lot of eyeshadow and if I do, itu2019s often a very simple look. This is such a great product for people who like a quick and easy shadow look to give the eyes some definition. Iu2019ve heard the darker shades can be patchy, but I had no issues with Social. Itu2019s much more wearable in person and less pink than it looks in the photos, and works great on my fair cool skin tone. I apply it with my fingers and then blend it with a brush. I find I have plenty of time to work with it before it dries down. I also didnu2019t have any issues with creasing. Totally going to pick up the shade Studio when itu2019s back in stock! Highly recommend.

reviews.review_title: Run donu2019t walk to buy this.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019d like to preface by saying that Iu2019m not great at applying makeup but Iu2019ve never received so many compliments than when Iu2019m using this product. I feel so confident with it. A must have

reviews.review_title: Add this to your daily routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very gorgeous colour and beautiful pigment. The perfect neutral taupe for a classic look! Iu2019m obsessed with the fact that itu2019s clean as well, no harmful chemicals.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been looking for a green eyeshadow that was not too bright or glittery to complement my hazel eyes.   This is it!   I can put it on softly and build if I want more color.   It goes on like a dream (I just use my fingers) and stays put.   Highly recommend.   I was not incentivized, i bought it myself.

reviews.review_text: so easy to apply and very buildable! love that you can make it as subtle or as bold as you want. the best eyeshadow i have ever used. obsessed with this shade too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

Itu2019s a bit hard to get off, and also you need to make sure it clicks when closing, otherwise it can kind of dry out. Close tightly!

reviews.review_title: This is now a staple in my makeup collection
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love products like this . The color is amazing and itu2019s something you can build up or keep it simple . This would be something I would use as a base and/or eyeshadow. I love how easy it blends gives it that effortless look !

reviews.review_title: Best product for a simple eye look
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so unbelievably obsessed with this product. Could not be easier to apply and looks good on everyone. The shadow doesn't budge once it sets and lasts all day without any creasing. Definitely going to purchase the other shades! Just remember to seal the product all the way so it doesn't dry out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is just what I was looking for. Last all day on my oil eyelids. Have a really good pigmentation and the application is so nice with just fingers. Donu2019t sleep on it !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this product - I am a huge Merit fan and this was the first product that I've purchased that I was disappointed in. The formula is not user friendly - it dries down super quickly and if you try to blend after it's dried, it gets super patchy and uneven. It's impossible to fix once this happens so you have to take it off and start over. I've tried this with and without shadow primer to no avail. You have so little time to blend and create shadow/shape before the product dries that it feels like it's meant for either an extremely imperfect/grunge/smudgy look or someone who works really really quickly. It also clumps on eyeshadow brushes making blending even harder. I purchased the new Merit eyeshadow brush just to use it with this, and even that brush clumps with this eyeshadow.   Giving it 3 stars - packaging is nice, the shades are stunning, and the price is ok for the amount of product, but the formula is just not great and it doesn't feel luxurious or innovative.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So into this product and how it sets on the lid. However, I need to run to the kitchen to get rubber gloves every time I open it because the packaging is so difficult. Hoping that the packaging gets fixed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really great eyeshadow, especially for someone who doesn't wear a lot of make-up. One coat is really subtle and fool-proof smudging with my fingers. The color builds in a really nice way that still is use friendly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I took two colors on my vacation and itu2019s all I needed for shadow. So nice and very easy to use. Blends very nicely and I love the color. Would love them in a stick too!

reviews.review_title: Great for oily lids, beautiful color options

I have no problem with screw top lid other reviews complain about - I like that it screws tight & won't dry out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The colour (Midcentury) is beautiful and the product applies easily, but the packaging is hard to open/close. The lid screws on, but it has to u201cclicku201d in order to be attached.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the color and the formula! It is my new everyday color. So easy to work with, build up, soften, etc. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So easy to work with, lasts all day. Not a big eyeshadow person and often wear just mascara but I've started wearing this almost every day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It may be fine for some but way too dry for me.  I had a difficult time blending it so it looked batural

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I never write reviews but this was bizarre. I love Merit and have a bunch of their products (they have the best lip oils). I was excited for this new launch but the first two times I used it I didnu2019t like the color (a lot lighter than online). I tried it again today and after a 15 hour day noticed it was green?? It isnu2019t coming off with remover either!

reviews.review_title: A bit of a learning curve, but very worth it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have played with several Merit eyeshadow colors. The two that work and look best for me is Social and Brun.  I use my finger to apply them and they blend and spread beautifully. I am more successful with my finger rather than a brush.  They dry down very quickly so I apply and blend one eye at a time.  I don't use a primer because I found that with a primer the shadows are too grippy and consequently dry patchy. Even without primer they last all day with no creasing and no color loss!  The formula is not very buildable and doesn't get much darker with additional layers. But it can be easily layered with other Merit or powder shadows on top. I've used the Brun color to add depth to Social and as a soft eyeliner.  These shadows are gorgeous, creamy, smooth and very matte. They are truly lovely to use. They work wonderfully as an everyday effortless eyeshadow look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted a deep, matte brown shade to flatter my blue eyes and this shadow is perfect. It truly is creamy so no powder fall-out when you apply it. It wears well too. The pot is a little strange as it has a lid you screw off. The lid is small so you have to have good finger dexterity to open and close it. I'm sure the lid is to protect the cream shadow from drying out. I will be buying more colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super neat product! I love stuff that is quick and easy to apply. This fits the bill!  Gives me enough time to work with it, but doesn't move around after it has dried. Very nice powder finish. I also really like that it doesn't settle in the creases on my eyelids!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product and its color. Choose your application brush carefully or, use your fingers. Wash the brush immediately afterward.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Super blendable and buildable! The perfect fall shade and great for contouring

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Didnu2019t love this one. I found the formula went on slightly patchy. Too bad because I wanted to love this product and I like the concept!

I really wanted to love this but I've had trouble blending the formula on my eyes; unless it's warm and melty, it does not apply well and looks patchy. I do love it to smudge on my lower and upper lash line using a small brush though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a stunning eyeshadow colour! I have oily eyelids and this eyeshadow lasts all day on me. Itu2019s so easy to blend. Highly recommend!
