reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These eyeshadow pots are fantastic. Creamy when you put them on but dry down to a soft matte finish. I have three colours: Social, Taupe and Brun. The swatches online are a very good representation of the colours. The colour lasts around 7 hours for me but I (primed with Pia Louise). And yes, I did get the dual-ended Merit Brush No. 2u2026 review left for it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The formula is awesome! The color is gorgeous (Midcentury)! It wears beautifully! However, they must do something about the packaging. I don't have dexterity issues, but even I often find it extremely difficult to open the jar! Either the lid needs to be taller or have some kind of angular shape to it. I would give it 5+ stars if I could easily get into it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff, beautiful color and I actually like the packing light and easy to travel. New staple.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought four of these (midnight, social, studio, and brun). the lighter colors (social and studio) and super soft and blend well. the darker colors are a lot more difficult. if you're willing to work with them, they can be really nice but it does take more effort to get them to blend. they dry down extremely fast and can get almost pilly. I find I have to use a lot more product than I expected. especially with the darker colors to get the blend I wanted. you basically have to cover the brush (or your finger) in it and move quickly or else it can get patchy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin

Also trying it as a base for gripping intense dark blue shadows that tend to stray.  A good foray into cream shadows, though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Will keep buying over and over

reviews.review_text: This is the best eye shadow I have ever used. It makes me want to throw out all of my palettes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought studio. Looked beautiful in my hand. I doesnt shows on my lids. I want to try social and mid century. Like how easy you can make your eyes with this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed with this eyeshadow!! It lasted on my eyes for a long time and it was so easy to work with! I got Viper which I loved and I think really complements my brown eyes! 10/10 ud83eudd0d

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this color. You can use it everyday and it is buildable to wear at night and make it smoky. It blends very nicely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The blend ability of different colors is variable. I bought Social and Viper - Social blends so easily and doesn't bunch up, lasts all day - it's idiot proof (I consider myself a makeup idiot). However Viper is quite finicky, has a tendency to be very patchy on my pale lids (bare lids mind you, no primer just skincare). It also has a somewhat dark base, so ends up being rather smokey/dramatic for daytime/work wear for me. That being said the color is unique enough in a cream formula AND I do find that it lasts well on me that I'm willing to fuss with it to blend it out and deal with the patchiness. Just be aware not all of these perform the same or are similarly fool proof! With the varied reviews I can't help wondering if then same variability is present in longevity, but I've had good luck with both Social and Viper regarding longevity.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very patchy and difficult to work with. I normally like cream shadows and cream to powder formulas but this one is not well executed. Doesn't wear down well throughout the day either with all the creasing. Despite that hard to actually remove at the end of the day. I fell like for this price for a single shadow you can get a whole palette in a lot of cases and get better results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Tested last night and it was a DELIGHT to apply. Plus I was wearing almost no face makeup (just a bit of concealer) and the colour was still a great compliment to my cool undertone, light skin & blue eyes.   I love cream eyeshadows, but easily fluff up the application, sometimes struggling to blend the edges & avoid crepey looking eyelids.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just received the eyeshadow. First, Studio is not a cool taupe. Studio is a warm light brown/peach kinda shade. Itu2019s a nice Color but the description is off. Packaging is hard to open and close. It seems to last.  P
Non ! Fait des patchu2019s de couleurs pas egales sur les paupieres meme etalee avec le pinceau merit ou au doigt , une fois sec fait ressortir les defauts des paupieres matures .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This lasted almost 8 hours on me which was impressive for clean beauty! No, it wonu2019t last alllll day without fading or creasing a little but a full workday without reapplying is nice (no eye primer used btw). Social is a beautiful color. They  it soft mauve. I would say thereu2019s very little purple on the skin and it does seem to be soft indeed. Supe flattering and feels great on the skin. I love this formula.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the eyeshadow Iu2019ve needed. I hope Merit does more colours. I struggle with dry eyes and it doesnu2019t irritate my eyes like a powder and it stays all day, no creasing. Just amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is great to use on itu2019s own or as an eyeshadow base! Great for deep skin tones. This shadow can give a natural and smokey glam which is what I love about it. Definitely a staple in my kit!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: OK, I bought this in the Studio shade the other day, and WOW.  WOW.  I am 100% an oily lid girly and this stayed put ALL DAY LONG with very minimal creasing.  I used the Too Faced Shadow Insurance underneath it and I'm shocked.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful color , packaging , and lasting power . Love this for a minimal makeup look for my 12 hour shift . Got home in the morning and it was still on !

reviews.review_title: Not u201ccool taupeu201d and creases badly
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I agree with a reviewer below who said that Studio, which is described as a u201ccool taupeu201d isnu2019t cool. It turned orange on me. Also, this shadow creased SO badly. Even with an eyeshadow primer. I do have  oily lids, but primer always does the trick usually. This is marketed as budge proof. Nope.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m loving these shadows. Iu2019m not one to do fancy looks with my eyeshadow, I just throw on a color and go and these are perfect and last all day. I first purchased Studio (cool taupe) and loved it so much that I then bought social (soft mauve), and I love them both. Great products!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love eyeshadow sticks that are blendable but dry down and donu2019t budge. I was hoping this would give me a similar look but it doesnu2019t dry down as budgeproof as I hoped. It is very blendable though. Itu2019s kind of like the merit blush stick consistency, only it doesnu2019t work for eyeshadow unless you like creasing and settling.   The biggest con is that itu2019s impossible to open and close. The pot and lid are so small you canu2019t get much grip to twist it open, and there is a click to shut the lid but you have to twist it really hard to get it to stay shut.   Iu2019m perfectly able to open jars and other containers lol, but I had to ask my husband to open it the first time, he joked that it was packaged like a bottle of pills. The consistency may have been forgiveable bc the other is so pretty, but the packaging gave me no doubt that I need to return it.   Too bad!

reviews.review_title: Must Have Everyday Staple for Everyday Makeup
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot rave enough about this color I literally use it to do my everyday eyeshadow and I even have used it to contour my nose and I am OBSESSED!!!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Packaging feels like cheap plastic and cap wouldnu2019t stay screwed tightly. Couldnu2019t use while traveling in my make up bag- cap wouldnu2019t stay on. Creases badly using either primer or concealer to prime lids.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Studio is absolutely NOT a cool taupe. It is orange as a pumpkin. There's nothing cool or taupe about it. Must return now.

reviews.review_title: Returned - color and texture not as described
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I returned this for several reasons. The color (studio) on eyes was not a cool taupe at all but rather turned to an orangey-peach. The texture looked horrible on my over-40 eyelids. It was a creases crepey mess. This is a big nope for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: unfortunately this didn't workout. going back to Mac paintpot in groundwork. I always get excited about one product as I don't like eyeshadow palettes for everyday. I don't typically have issue with creasing but this shadow creased in few hours. it's also hard to blend and applies patchy, this can be fixed by blending with multiple brushes. if you want quick application and easy blend go with MAC. returning this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sadly, this product wasn't a win for me. I love Merit and wanted to love the ease and convince of this shadow, however it doesn't wear very well, creased within minutes of application. I used to be a makeup artist, so wasn't user error as I tried a few different times a few different ways (different eye primers, bare lids, on top of powders, setting powder on top) and always use a setting spray. I feel like with some tweeking, Merit can make this perform better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE HOW LIGHT IT IS. Everytime I go to work I use this because itu2019s so classy and casual.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The vachetta is such a gorgeous and warm color for all over the eye! It has such a smoooooth application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I looove this. I struggle with eyeshadow creasing and this lasts almost all day before it very lightly creases. It's super easy to apply, but it does dry quickly. I prefer to use a clean finger so I can get a nicer smuged look, but brushes work great too. The colour is a perfect everyday shade, and works for my lazy girl makeup. It's also a great shade for blue eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The eyeshadow formula is beautiful but the lid is tough to manage!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have good and bad days with this eyeshadow. Today I applied it at 8am, itu2019s8 pm and itu2019s still intact. Other days I apply it and lasts 2 hours. Overall, I have more good days so I do recommend! it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone with a very oily, very hooded eye.. I was hesitant to try a cream eye shadow because they havenu2019t worked in the past. I still use a primer, but this lasts and blends like a dream!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I normally am not an eyeshadow but this product quickly changed that. This formula is so beautiful and natural. Shade Studio is perfect for fall and everyday. I love this so much itu2019s become a staple in my routine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So so sooo patchy. I donu2019t know what kind of sorcery is required to make this look good. Iu2019m convinced everyone who likes this is lyingu2026 sorry! Love the color so this sucks

Love love love this shadow.  I bought two colors and love they way they look.  Itu2019s a subtle dab of color with amazing staying power.  I would not combine colors, I like using them for a simple look one and done.  Please add lighter colors like a champagne

reviews.review_title: wish it worked well but beautiful colour
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love Merit, I use their products everyday and was super excited for these eyeshadows. I sampled the colours in store on my hand and was shocked that they didn't budge even after using hand sanitizer. So of course I had to buy it and the brush too.  Midcentury is a beautiful colour on my skin, but unfortunately it creases. I've tested it out for 5 days, prepping it differently each day. With a eyeshadow primer, a comment on Instagram suggested putting their minimalist on your lids first then the eye shadow, didn't work for me, still creased. I put it on very thinly, still creases. I guess your lids can't produce any oil for it to stay on all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the shadow in Studio; it goes on effortlessly and gives a smooth finish. I did not like the shadow in Brun. The darker shade went on so patchy; I tried using their brush and my fingers. I had to return Brun.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Applies very nicely with a Sigma E55. No need to buy the merit brush if you have others to hat work for cream-ish shadows. I almost returned this because I started by applying with my fingers and it was very cakey.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not as easy to blend as reviews made it out to be, itu2019s ok but itu2019s a little sticky. Just an average eyeshadow

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Use it sparingly with a soft hand. The warm color (midcentury) pulled too orange on my olive light-medium tone skin. The more cool toned hue (social mauve) worked better to give me a soft wash of dark color. Perfect for a one and done eye makeup for brown eyes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not much of an eyeshadow person, but these are absolutely stunning! Super easy to use, and the shade Studio looks beautiful on my fair skin. Happy to have this in my makeup bag!

reviews.review_title: The Dark Shades Don't Preform Well
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this so bad, but this was the patchiest shadow I have ever used. Unfounrtnley this shadow in the shade viper missed the mark. I bought Social and it blends like a dream and looks amazing on, which is why I was so disappointed to see how bad Viper was. It layered terribly, and it looked like it was crumbling off of my eyes. I'd say if you want to buy these go for the lighter shades and steer clear from the darker ones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous gorgeous!!! Almost all eyeshadows crease on me, itu2019s to be expected at this point. However this doesnu2019t at all, even without a primer! I havenu2019t worn for more than 4-5 hrs but it held up really well. Itu2019s a thin and sheer formula and gives a beautiful, effortless wash of color, though it can still be built up and blends nicely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very patchy. Creased after 10 minutes. Did not last all day. A product that I would not reach for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: One star for the color, which is a rich shade of brown. I have no idea how anyone is getting this shadow not to crease -- within 30 minutes, I have the dreaded crease line. The whole point of this product is to stay fresh for hours, so I really don't want to buy a primer. I've tried it multiple ways (finger, different brushes) on a clean, dry eyelid and it's fairly useless. I returned it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this eyeshadow on a whim, and i love it. The color pay off is great. I was pleasantly surprised to see zero creasing (i know, i was shocked too). Iu2019ve read some reviews on the poor packaging but you really just gotta make sure you turn it until you hear the snap. Problem solved!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: terrible packing! lid does not close properly! does not work for a cream product. Brun is very, very patchy. cannot get an even application! Save your money! Better products exist for less .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My first impression was blah ! however Ive never used this type of eye shadow before so with a little practice aka trial and error I can now say I love it. The color is stunning with a capital S and it last wearing. Little tip - when using a brush with this guy make sure you clean it. I would say almost daily, the product dries fast and it can build up quickly and ruin your application. I prefer to use my finger and then blend it out with a brush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: it's a good everyday shadow, although it is expensive I haven't seen anything similar to it. it's buildable but you need to move quickly to blend it out. I'd recommend it but only if you have the money to spare for it

reviews.review_title: Editorial and Glamour All in One!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just used this eyeshadow over the weekend for my friendu2019s wedding. It was extremely hot and humid outside but this did not budge. I used it as a base shadow all over and then applied a little shimmer over it and it was beautiful. I got so many compliments on it. I wear it by itself to work because it blends out nicely so I just have a wash of color on my lid. This definitely allows me to do glam looks but also gives me that everyday editorial feel as well. I really love this and the brush it great. The fluffy side does a beautiful job blending and the more compact side is great for your undereye or on the outer corner if you want to pack on some product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cream shadow so easy to build and blend. Waiting for another color to come back in stock.

reviews.review_title: Cap doesn't fit tightly, will dry out too quick
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The cap doesn't close tightly. It's wobbly and falls of in a makeup bag. Not good for a cream product as it will dry out. However if they redesign the packaging midcentury is a nice brown to make blue eyes pop.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is revolutionary!!! It lays so beautifully on the eyelid and is super buildable. I love using it for days i donu2019t want to put too much work in but still want a beautiful simple eye look! It alway does not smear, i have super oily eyelids and this stayed put! 10/10 would recommend!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this but it is way too expensive to be underperforming when compared to drugstore counterparts. The colors are beautiful and applied nicely but the wear time was just not it. It creased severely on me, granted I probably have oilier eyelids than others but for this price it's not justifiable. I wanted to use it for lighter make up days as my one and done. If have normal lids and can get away with just concealer as a base without creasing then it might be a winner. So bummed it didn't work out for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m obsessed!! Itu2019s so blendable and buildable so itu2019s perfect for a natural eye look or a nighttime look. It goes on beautifully and is long-lasting. I love using it with the Brush No2 from MERIT!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Do not believe the overhyped reviews u201creceived free product for honest reviewsu201d theyu2019re never really honest. I excited to try this but it just didnu2019t blend well. And the packaging is terrible. They fit that. It looks like the product itself will dry out . S

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this shadow. Non-creasing, stays put and is a soft, buildable coverage. I love love love the formula.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: When I initially saw this color online I thought it would be too purple, but after testing it in store itu2019s actually more taupe than it looks in the online photo. I love it! Just hoping they change the packaging

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What the heck is this packaging? Itu2019s honestly comical how they designed the lid to be smaller than the container, so itu2019s almost impossible to get a good grip on it. Huge bummer because the product is very nice!

reviews.review_title: My new holy grail eye shadow
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the eyeshadow I have been looking for. The set powder is smooth and not dry, looks very natural. The color is amazing. Iu2019ve tried ever shadow out there and this is the one!!

reviews.review_title: Want to recommend but I canu2019t
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The eyeshadow when brand new is really amazing. The packaging is awful. Mine wonu2019t click closed (meritu2019s response: u201clids can be tricky!u201d) and because of that, itu2019s already drying out after just two weeks.

reviews.review_title: Great, but packaging is not it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the formula and consistency. It dries fast so be mindful of that. I absolutely hate the packaging. Itu2019s hard to open and hard to shut. If you have any dexterity issues, this may not be a good fit.

reviews.review_title: Absolutely My New favorite eyeshadow itu2019s amazing!
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love these Shadow formula that glides on so smooth and creamy with there eyeshadow brush is amazing to blend with too. It transform into a velvety powder texture which gives you a bold natural look with this shade warm brown. My New favorite eyeshadow!!

reviews.review_title: Gorgeous product is a game changer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm obsessed with this formula - glides on smooth, blends like a powder, and does not budge! I do think application is key for this one, though. You have plenty of time to blend before the cream dries, but I recommend finishing 1 eye at a time to maximize blend-ability. I like the Midcentury color for all-over the lid, and then the Nelson shade as a smoky liner. I love that the top layer doesn't remove/patch-up the bottom layer, which is common in non-powder formulas.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the shade Nelson, and it is such a gorgeous shade! However, it creases after literally 30 minutes. Iu2019ve tried applying it many ways, and it does not last AT ALL. Iu2019m not sure about the 5 star reviews claiming no creasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Solo Shadow in the shade Brun and I canu2019t stop raving about it! This cream eye shadow is an absolute game-changer. It effortlessly glides on and transforms into a velvety powder finish thatu2019s unlike any other. Whether youu2019re going for a subtle, everyday look or a bold, dramatic eye, this product delivers.  The packaging is sleek and compact, making it easy to carry in your makeup bag for touch-ups on the go. Iu2019ve received so many compliments since I started using the Solo Shadow, and people constantly ask me what Iu2019m wearing on my eyes.  If youu2019re looking for an eye shadow thatu2019s not only easy to use but also delivers stunning results, the Solo Shadow is a must-have in your makeup collection. Trust me; you wonu2019t regret it. Itu2019s a five-star product that I recommend to everyone who wants to elevate their eye makeup game!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Eyeshadow usually takes me the longest. This product makes it SO easy, looks incredible, and lasts ALL. DAY. Love it so much and highly recommend. I apply it w their Brush No. 2 and it is the perfect combo.

reviews.review_title: The only eyeshadow you will ever want
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only eyeshadow you will ever need!! The formula and color couldnu2019t be more perfect. It glides on so easy. I am not the best at eyeshadow and I feel like a pro the way this looks after putting it on specifically with their brush no 2. I use this every day for a minimalist pop of color

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought Studio & Social. Social is a beautiful color that made my green eyes pop. However, after using each color only a couple of times, they completely dried out! They are impossible to blend and just sit on my eyes like smudges and won't budge.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am pleasantly surprised by this formula. Itu2019s very creamy and pigmented. The texture is pretty soft and easy to blend. Once it is set, itu2019s not going to move or budge!! One quick tip, keep your eyes closed for about 30 seconds and let it dry down. Then open your eyes to get the best results. If you are still skeptical, then please go to the store, swatch it and see for yourself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted these by merit and am totally in love. I chose a more natural shade and love it for a more subtle look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful soft mauve color. The formula glides on smoothly and the color is very wearable. It lasts without creasing. Feels very light on the skin even after layering a few times. One pic shows it applied in natural light, the other is by a window .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So creamy and buildable, Merit always makes makeup so effortless. Can't wait to try more shades of this!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am usually not an eye shadow fan but Merit made it so easy with the solo shadow. It blends so well and looks amazing. My favorite part is how easy it is to apply!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Product is decent. Packing is horrible, looks cheap and hard to open and close. May return based on packing issue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great formula and is extremely easy to use. I looking forward to trying more shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love how chic and simple this is! Perfect formula and brush

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such an easy eyeshadow for beginners! Formula is super quick to blend out and the shade social is perfect for everyday wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have the navy shade, and its so patchy without primer, but works better with primer and a brush. I bought this as a one and done, and a primer and a brush complicate the process.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been loving this eyeshadow recently! It pairs perfectly with my Minimalist in the shade linen and is the perfect addition to my no makeup, makeup look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This might be the worst packaging I've ever experienced. Zero grip with the tiniest lid that it's almost impossible to fit my fingers around. I would comment on the product but I'm unable to ope. It.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Goes on nicely and itu2019s a beautiful color. The packaging though, the twist top doesnu2019t seem to tighten enough to stay closed. I am hoping it doesnu2019t dry out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: best eyeshadow on the market for those of us over 40! so velvety and blends well. perfect color!

reviews.review_title: The only shadow in my bag from now on...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After trying Midcentury and Studio (both read too orange on my fair complexion and made me look tired), Social hit the mark. It appears VERY plum on my monitor but in person, it's a more of a neutral - beautfully pigmented, rich earthy taupe with slight lavender undertone that can be worn anytime. It makes blue/hazel eyes pop. It's perfection. Creamy, easy to apply and does NOT move all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this shadow! It perfectly compliments my The Minimalist shade and completes my natural no-makeup, makeup look! The product applies so easy and smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Super emollient and easy to blend, beautiful finish. I have hooded, oily lids, so I have to use a primer and setting powder, but I use that with all my eye products bc everything creases on me no matter what. I have three shades: Social, Viper, and Brun, and I love them all. Best way to apply is with finger. Creates a smooth finish every time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First off let me say that this was gifted to me along with a beautiful eyeshadow products. To be honest with you I don't normally wear eyeshadow day to day. This color is a real wonderful option for something neutral and I feel like I will get a lot of wear out of it. Merit is a fabulous company and I have yet to find a product I dislike.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These eyeshadow is so creamy but does not crack when it dry so itu2019s perfect for every weather. Also it could work as eyeshadow primer to make you powder eyeshadow more intense.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eyeshadow has become an absolute essential in my makeup bag! I travel a lot and love that this single shadow gives me the perfect natural, glowy makeup look. This cream shadow doesn't crease even after wearing it all day! I would highly highly recommend this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this eye shadow! It goes on so smoothly & doesnu2019t leave creases. It lasted me all day & didnu2019t fade or smudge. I am thoroughly impressed & will for sure repurchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Y'all. This eyeshadow is terrible. I am flummoxed by the collective delusion when it comes to this brand. The packaging is uniformly terrible. Product wobbles and falls out of their stick components. Performance and staying power of the creams is zero. Maybe because they've slammed influencers with free product? However, people whose opinion I respect have been falling over themselves for this eyeshadow, and it looks bad even as they are applying it right in front of my eyeballs while extolling its virtues. Half of the model photos on THIS PAGE look terrible. It's dry, patchy, I can't figure out how to get it to cover smoothly or evenly or blend out into anything other than a bruised look. Not to mention that this color is not taupe by anyone's definition. Get a Paint Pot, or even a Revlon pot.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love how the formula in this eye shadow is so blendable and natural.   Itu2019s very perfect for an everyday wear, or to even add the extra unf! Iu2019ve been using it everyday and for special events on myself and absolutely love it, and have gotten many compliments!   Such a fast, easy and blendable application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s a no. I bought it, I tried it, I wore it for 6 hour and it creased. This stuff dries VERY quickly so you better work faster than fast. I had higher expectations, I can just FEEL the product in the pot drying up in a month or so, sure it buttery now u2026 but donu2019t trust it will be that way for long. I returned it.

reviews.review_title: This lasted eye shadow lasted through a lot
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Today - without creasing (which has never not happened to me) this lasted me in Texas, in my home that the ac just broke in, all the way to New York, while walking and taking the sub. Blown away (I sweat sm)

reviews.review_title: The Shadow For A Easy Pop Of Color!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After trying this product, I feel so bad for not opening it sooner! This shadow is the easiest application ever! The shadow paired with the brush glides on so smooth definitely easy for beginners. I applied it two different ways. I think I like it better in the crease only, either way this green color is amazing and I canu2019t wait for this fall season. I definitely want to purchase other colors. The consistency of the formula feels really good almost moisturizing. Love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really appreciate a creamy formula and I loved that Merit was able to nail it! The shades they released are very unique!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After using this eyeshadow I may never go back to using powder shadows again! The blend is incredible and you donu2019t have to use very much product at all which makes this even better since itu2019ll last so long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So far Iu2019m loving this product. It goes on easily and dries beautiful.  I've had zero crease issues, I do use an eyeshadow base.  Blend it out.      ccc crease issues

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Please, stop reading the reviews written by those who receive products in exchange for their u201chonestu201d reviews. I was very excited when these shadows popped up. I use only matte eye colors because Iu2019m 60 with pretty great skin (so far) but I have hooded eyes and anything glimmer/shimmery is a hot mess on my lids. I had great hopes for these eye colors, and I bought three (Nelson, Studio, Viper). The darker shades DO CREASE, even when applied lightly. Studio wears the best but itu2019s a weird orangy shade on me. When Nelson or Viper are used as liners, they DO SMEAR on the lower lash line. So lesson learned, I will no longer read u201cIncentiveu201d reviews. And Sephora should stop using them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Donu2019t believe the incentivized reviews. These are dry, patchy, and difficult to blend.

reviews.review_title: Performs like a revlon eye shadow with high price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This looks and performs like my revlon cream eyeshadows. The colour studio was not a u201ccool taupeu201d on me, it was an orangey brown. The mauve one looked better but I still wouldnu2019t recommen

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this eyeshadow- it's perfect for everyday wear and it goes on so smoothly

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Extremely patchy and it clumps if I try to put on a second layer.  It also is not very pigmented.  I won't buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was shocked at how patchy this eyeshadow was and how little pigment there was. I tried to do a really dark eye but it fades out as soon as it hits the skin and then gets really patchy. Iu2019m going to give it another try, but I really wouldnu2019t recommend.

reviews.review_title: Adding this in my makeup routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First, I really love the packaging. I love how the color and how pigmented it is. Itu2019s a great addition to my make up routine. Love all the merit products! So happy they released an eyeshadow product

reviews.review_title: Social is an under appreciated color
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019d take off one star for the marketing because the color swatching on models are really misleading. Social is perfect neutral shade to add depth for very fair skin people and it is NOT the pinky color on the model. Instead, it is kinda a neutral taupe color with a wash of mauve on my lids that pops my eyes while adding depth to them. Also I would skip the color Studio because it shows peachy tone on my lids as expected and not as described. The lasting power is great on my dry skin and works well with liquid eyeliner so I didnu2019t see any issue. Also the brush works so well with the shadow and it blends beautifully, it is a little expensive on my opinion but worths the experience. I hope they will be available in stores soon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this shadow. It's easy to use; buildable; doesn't crease. I bought Studio as well as the brush, although I used my finger to apply. I prefer to apply cream shadows (in a stick or pot) using my pinky finger. I applied following my usual process for all shadows: eyelid primer, patted in the shadow all over my lid, set with MUFE HD powder. Done. Lasted all day.   The shade isn't really taupe; it's more of a natural beige shade.  Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product!! Itu2019s so easy to apply and lasts the whole day/night!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love a good brown matte cream eyeshadow. I have tried many ranging from high to low end (Bobbi Brown stick, Laura Mercier stick, tom ford pot, mac paint pot, Patrick starr Matte, fiona stiles, Maybelline- Bobbi Brown being my favorite). I was so excited to try this one because the colour range is perfect and they are matte. However, I found this to be so patchy. I bought the colour midcentury. I tried with a primer and without a primer and it was just a patchy mess on me.I even had to remove it and start over which I never do. I did use my fingers, but I always use my fingers. it was a no for me. I just couldn't get it to work. The packaging is lovely and I love how there is a click on the jar to make sure it is air tight.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love Merit but wish theyu2019d get better about their color shades for darker skinned people. Its too sheer like a lot of their products so their browns donu2019t really show up on my skin unless I layer heavily or do a basefurst.

reviews.review_title: Love the color but packaging needs improvement
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the shade midcentury after watching countless reviews, even though vachetta is my nude color based on the foundation shade. I have to say I love the color and the blendability of this product! I'm obsessed with Merit beauty overall. The only thing I don't love about this product is the packaging. It's quite hard to open and you have to make sure you close it properly. They should make the top more of a hexagon shape instead of the round top and round bottom.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow I have no clue if I got a bad batch or if my eyelids are somehow defective because everyone seems to love this but I absolutely hated it. It was almost oily & slippery in the pan, but when applied it bunched up in weird patches & wouslnt blend, even with using their eyeshadow brush meant to accompany these. Just really disappointing & super weird.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how this product is long wear and has a no crease formula. I had this shadow on for a night out and it did not budge. Moreover I loved the application, it went on my eyelids so smoothly.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful Formula, Not a Must Have
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is beautiful and easy to blend. The colors, however, are not original enough for anyone who has a basic neutral palette or an otherwise normal collection of eyeshadows. This is definitely for someone who truly wants a one and done look, so while the product is wonderful, I will be returning since itu2019s not unique enough to keep.

reviews.review_title: It didn't budge and I forgot I was wearing it!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: # It didn't budge!!  - For reference: Solo Shadow in Studio, dark brown hair, brown eyes, light complexion, normal-combination skin.   - I can't believe I of all people (I focus mainly on my thick brows + lip products) was this impressed about an eyeshadow! I can't say I have ever been great at applying makeup, and because of this, I tend to go for more natural looks with as minimal makeup as possible, especially excluding eyeshadow.   - After trying the Solo Shadow for about 2 weeks, I definitely can recommend this eyeshadow! It was so easy to put on, even I couldn't even mess it up! I dabbed it with my ring finger on casual days over my lid only, since I have pretty hooded eyes. On date night I blended it out with Brush No. 2 for a more pigmented look and used the precise end to line my bottom lash line!   - It dried down so quickly, was petal soft to the touch, and hadn't moved for the hours I wore it. It came off effortlessly with my double-cleanse routine. I used a bit of Merit's Day Glow in Cava on the center of my lid to finish the look! Truly adding to the entire 5-minute makeup. It is so effortless I can do my makeup in the car!  This will definitely live in my collection! Thanks, Merit Team!! u2661

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is great for an all over shadow look. It blends very nicely and has good staying power.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this shade for daily wear! The  formula is so creamy and easy to blend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the creamy texture but it was a little difficult to apply and blend. Itu2019s perfect for an everyday look. Has a matte finish.

Absolutely love the colors (I got social and brun) and application, but it definitely creases within 30 minutes of applying. I found it easy to apply and blend. It does dry down fairly quick. I donu2019t know if Iu2019ll purchase again, but I will use up the ones I have cos they do look prettayyy nice!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love using this as an eyeliner blended into an eyeshadow. It makes the eyes pop a little more when I'm going for a no-makeup-makeup look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The formula is nice, but the color description is extremely misleading.  Studio, described as a cool taupe, is a very light peachy brown, emphasis on peachy.  I have taupe hair (that means ashy light brown, since this brand doesn't seem to know what taupe is) and light cool toned skin.  This product looks absolutely awful on me.  Moreover, the product is extremely sheer and adding more to darken it only seems to accentuate the warmth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely in love with the texture,the result on my eyes,oh and the packaging.As soft as it should be,easily applied and super long stay!I also use the Vachetta shade as a contour,som times,as it matches with my skin type.I love the packaging which is minimal but luxurious at the same time.Overall an amazing product!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this product, Meritu2019s mascara is still my favourite ever, but this eyeshadow is NOT taupe. On the fair-skinned model it looks like a neutral pinkish tone but as someone else noted it is more a clay colour. It is very orangey on my skin and I had to neutralize it with a grey eyeshadow on top of it which defeats the purpose of minimalist makeup. Since I donu2019t want orangey eyeshadow I wonu2019t be using this very much. Also although once itu2019s on itu2019s definitely on, I didnu2019t find it easy to manipulate for that reason. Feeling very disappointec

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I see a lot of the positive reviews received this for free to test. I didnu2019t. It was not smooth and dried down so fast it made it impossible to blend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am not usually an eye-shadow kind of girl, but this is so smooth and easy to use. It elevates my look seamlessly. Another 5-star product from Merit Beauty.

reviews.review_title: Colors are not what they appear!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Sorry, I tried to review Social which is described as plum, buy there seems to be a glich in the review software. This is not plum nor a purple. More like a bland light brown. Similar problem with Studio.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Drabu2026..what a waste.  The undertones have a gray caste.  Thick. Iu2019ve never used a cream shadow that made me look tired. This one did.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First of all this color is not as described. This is not a cool taupe. Itu2019s more of a clay color. So that was a bummer. Secondly the first time I wore it it seemed to disappear pretty quickly. Iu2019m going to try one more time and then return  if Iu2019m not more impressed and stick with my beloved Ilia shadows. I have to wonder if all these stellar reviews were from folks gifted with the product.

reviews.review_title: Vachetta is such a nice rich BEIGE
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Vachetta is such a nice rich beige. People need to realize beige is a light brown. It's in the brown family. So the color does match the description. The texture of this product is like butter. I love how the shades are regal and rich. Timeless colors that go with anything.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super easy to blend cream to powder formula! Iu2019ve been using this as my quick everyday eyeshadow since I got it, Midcentury is the perfect warm brown shade. I also love that itu2019s buildable, you can really layer it for more depth. Once itu2019s dry it does become smudge proof, so you do have to work rather quickly.

reviews.review_title: Iu2019m so confused!! Looks nothing like on the models
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I ordered this in Social, Midnight and Nelson. While I love Social the Midnight is terrible. I am fair/med skinned and I canu2019t get this product to have any color payoff. It wonu2019t stay on and I prep my eye. Hoping Nelson is better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Supposed to be a cream to powder but this is a lot dryer and cease-y than all of the regular powders that I own. Also it looks like I'm the only who spent their own money on these -  From what I can see everyone else got sent the entire set for free for a positive review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best cream to powder eyeshadow iu2019ve ever tried. Lasts all day- even when the rest of my makeup has melted off my oily skin in the Texas heat. The soft grey color I chose (nelson) makes my light blue eyes pop like crazy AND works well as a soft eyeliner instead of black/brown. Excited for more colors!

reviews.review_title: A new favorite eye shadow product in my collection
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this eye shadow! Itu2019s so easy to blend to get the perfect color pay off! Iu2019m obsessed with this color midcentury itu2019s perfect for everyday wear, I even wear this for no makeup looks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this eye shadow so much. Doesnu2019t crease one bit and stays on all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is SO good! It blends perfectly and is just the right amount of color for the eyes. Will be repurchasing this, 10/10

reviews.review_title: Wanted to love this, but no
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this product but it was a miss for me. As other non-incentivized reviews mentioned, itu2019s very difficult to blend, even with the Merit double-ended brush. Streaky and creased within half an hour. The colour I chose (Nelson) was extremely flat; matte shadows are my fave but this leaned towards chalky. Would not recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased Vachetta and Studio. Unfortunately they crease in just a few hours. The colors were my style, just one and done and dry down really quickly. They felt thicker than Mac paint pots though. Iu2019m returning both colors sadly. If they wore better Iu2019d keep them but I cannot deal with creasing and I set these first with an eye primer just like I do with Mac paint pots but these donu2019t last throughout my work day. The packaging is hard to open and close, I feel like if Iu2019m not careful I wonu2019t put the lid on all the way and it will dry out. I use painterly from Mac often and wanted to see if these merit shadows were similar as they are less expensive per color. were comparable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I typically enjoy Merit products but these cream shadows have been significantly overhyped. They are difficult to blend and the darker colors can be very patchy. I would never describe Studio as a taupe. It barely shows up on my medium skin and looks very warm on skin tones. Itu2019s been bizarre to watch Merit ads claiming eyeshadow should be easy when these are significantly more difficult to blend than powder shadow and creams from other brands and to watch influencers declare how great these are as we watch them struggle to blend and ultimately end up with extremely patchy and unflattering eye looks. Loved the idea of these but the quality is not what I was expecting.

reviews.review_title: Extremely easy to use and simple!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The formula is absolutely amazing! I love how creamy and blendable it is, it looks so natural on the eyes and is perfect for an everyday wear!
packaging looks nice but hard to open and close. streaky and expensive for one shadow. i got studio and social. they are basically the same color but online look very different. returned!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love how smooth the product is and how easily it glides on! Perfect for on the go!

reviews.review_title: Not bad but not exactly what I wanted
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wasn't a fan of the formula, I thought it was hard to apply with a brush. I did like it with my fingers and I did like the thickness and easiness to smudge. I also tried Studio, the lighter shade, and I found that Social is quite similar in color on the skin. The mauve/purple color seem to go away even if I pack on more, and so I'm left with a very subtle mauve (much unlike the photos of this shade) that is much closer to Studio but with a tinge of mauve/purple. I would have liked it to look a bit more purple personally, but it's not a bad color. The way I see it, Studio is for warm toned skins and Social is for cooler tones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been enjoying Merits newest Solo Shadow u2026 itu2019s buildable, creamy and smudge proof. Works seamlessly with Merits newest Double Sided Brush No.2 Eyeshadow Brush. Can be tough to open.  *Received from Merit     be hard to open

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought a second shade because the first purchased was not great and wanted to give it another try. Requires purchase to try the product since it isn't in store. I have nearly every brand of cream shadow and this is one of the worst I've bought. It's very dry for a cream shadow once applied and looks dull/flat on the lid, the two taupe colors have strong yellow tones, it's not blendable. It is the worst product I've ever tried from Merit. Nearly all of the positive reviews here are people who were incentivized by free product. Really off putting. Hopefully Merit will improve the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This formula is so easy to work with. Itu2019s so much easier to blend than the Bobbi Brown shadow sticks I have been using before, and the color is so versatile and wearable. Very happy with this new addition to the Merit lineup

reviews.review_title: Creases quickly - not worth the money
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was very excited about these and bought five directly from Merit. The navy eyeshadow didnu2019t last an hour before it started creasing.  This photo is after two hours. I had the same issue with the green.

reviews.review_title: Iu2019ve been reaching for it every day
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love a natural, clean look and this shadow helps me achieve that. I have blonde hair and brown eyes and this shade really compliments my warmer tones. Iu2019ve been using it every day since I got it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The formula is amazing! I love how creamy it is and how it looks on the eyes

reviews.review_title: Great for on the go and for light medium skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the color and how useful the product is!  These days I rarely use anything other than bronzer on my eyes, It was so easy to work with and I love color social on my light/medium skin. Didnu2019t crease!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed would be an understatement!! This product so soft to the touch and glides on so smooth on the eyelid! It also lasts a very long time, and is the perfect shadow for every day minimal wear!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the formula, super creamy and buildable. I have been reaching for this shadow as its super quick and easy to use! One step and your eyeshadow look is complete! Definitely going to try out other colours!

reviews.review_title: Creasing, patchiness, and quick dry down
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve got to give Merit props - theyu2019ve certainly bamboozled the beauty community with these eyeshadows.  Unlike others reviewing this product, I purchased this on my own from the Sephora website the day of release.  I purchased two colors: studio and viper. I like studio better from a shade perspective. Here are the issues. 1. The shadow dries down VERY quickly so youu2019ll need to do one eye at a time and make sure that where you want your shadow is where you really want it.  2. You cannot layer these shadows. I wanted to use viper in my crease and to darken my right corner but guess what happens when you do that? It creases.  As a side note, I did purchase the new merit brush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The color is incredible and the pigment is to die for. It is so easy to put on and a small bit goes a long way! I love that I can buy just one color instead of committing to a whole palette. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The formula is easy to work with, pigmented and doesn't budge once it sets.  While the packaging looks beautiful,  it's just not practical. The lid is difficult to grasp and needs some force to open & click closed.  I also found this shade was not flattering on my fair skin as it leans too warm.  I'd try another shade if it weren't for the tricky lid.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eyeshadow is like nothing I've used before and I love it! It's so so smudge proof and also is super easy to build and layer for a more dramatic look. I'm obsessed!!

reviews.review_title: Nice concept, not original, ultimately no thanks
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The package is beautiful looking but hard to open and close, not a problem I've ever encountered with any other makeup product. The color is creamy for a few seconds and the dries down VERY quickly, not allowing time to bkend. A miss gor me.    aallowing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: When I first opened this I didnu2019t know what to think, but my gosh it is perfect! It blends out so smooth and even with an airbrush soft type finish. This color makes blue eyes pop. I even layered other shadows with it and it plays well with others. Iu2019ll be getting all the shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the texture of the shadow as well as how the brush applies the product so smooth. It also lasts with no creasing! This is now my daily shadow. Natural looking and feels good on the eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Such a beautiful shadow. This blended like a dream with the No.2 eyeshadow brush from Merit and its the perfect shadow duo. I selected this colour based off of my skin tone and my shade in the Minimalist Complexion Stick and it looks amazing on my skin. Usually I don't love cool tones but this one looks so pretty on. I have very fair skin for reference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a beautifully made product, from the formula to the packaging. Iu2019ve been using this product to deepen my outer corners instead of my usual contour stick. Itu2019s super easy to apply woth the No.2 brush and blends seamlessly

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had such high hopes for this shadow but am very disappointed. It's not nearly as creamy as I'd hoped. I tried applying and blending both with a brush and with my finger. I had to tug and pull on my lids to apply and blend. It's allergy season and with watery eyes it streaks. Unfortunately I'll have to return it. Very sad about that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: really pretty color but it creased and disappeared after 4ish hours. was also patchy and too time consuming to blend out. would rather use regular bronzer and an eyeshadow brush

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately, Studio - cool taupe isn't an accurate colour description when applied to pale skin. I am fair with a pink undertone, and the shadow looks orange on me. I kept thinking there was a mistake with the packaging, but after reading someone else's review, my concerns were confirmed that unfortunately, Studio pulls warm/orange. That being said the texture is nice! I also bought the eye shadow brush to apply it. A little goes a long way and it's buildable. I would like to try a different colour. Overall, I would recommend but wouldn't recommend this colour for fair/pale skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Submitting another review but this time for Vachetta. Iu2019ll attach a pic again so you can see Vachetta on top and Studio below. Vachetta is sold as a warm beige but it is a more neutral toned brown. Studio pulls orangey-red on me so Vachetta might be the winner for my neutral. Iu2019d love to see this shade range expanded to more neutrals, light shades, and mid tones. Nice texture, easy to use, and stays put.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: his product is so easy to apply and is very pigmented. The formula is creamy but the finish is matte which i love. definitely recommend this itu2019s super easy to use and a good day to day color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin

A mink brown thatu2019s slightly griege but not dark gray.

reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from Merit to try and I absolutely love it! As a makeup beginner whou2019s working from home with cameras on in the zoom, this is the perfect no fuss easy to use formula. Iu2019ve tried and mastered a smokey winged liner look and even used Midnight as an all over colour. I love how easy the cream formula applies with fingers and with Brush No. 2. Is so hard to mess up!

reviews.review_title: Colours too warm, creases for sure
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve used social and brun for about a week now. I ended up keeping social because the colour was easier to blend out on my fair skin. I really wanted to like brun for a liner and occasional smoky eye, but these shadows are a bit tricky for fair skin. Firstly, the shades run sooooo warm. I really hope merit can introduce some truly cool or at least neutral shades in the future. Even social, which is one of the cooler shades in the range, can run a rosy brown (reminiscent of a pink eye infection) if I apply a light layer with the brush. Instead, I use my finger to apply a generous amount and that seems to help with the colour pay off. The key here is using a generous amount, otherwise, as was the case with brun, it will dry quickly and go patchy. I suppose because the contrast between light skin and dark brown shadow was so strong, I couldnu2019t use the large amount either with a finger or a brush. With my finger I could blend out a little bit and it would be fine. But it creases, for sure. I donu2019t know if I have some sort of unusually oily eyelids, but these crease on me and they crease quickly. I donu2019t mind with social because it doesnu2019t contrast with my natural skin colour as much, but when a thin diffused layer of brun creases on me it would just emphasize fine lines I didnu2019t know I had on my eyelids. It also was far too warm for my liking to use even as a gel eyeliner substitute. Applying brun with the brush was super patchy on my light skin, again because I had to use smaller amounts of product to not go too dark, and therefore it would dry super quickly.  With that being said, the brush is fine, I will keep it cause I donu2019t have many brushes but I wouldnu2019t bother if you own others. Like I said, for me I found these to work best with your fingers regardless, the small side is fine but there are better options. My small side is a little bit uneven and not the best eyeliner/shadow brush Iu2019ve ever seen. Also the handle of the brush is an inch too short for comfort.

reviews.review_title: Huge miss for Meritu2014patchy and unflattering
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: To start, let me say that up until now, Iu2019ve genuinely loved Merit as a brand. Iu2019ve tried most items in their range, and Iu2019ve purchased the foundation stick many, many times over. Iu2019m also a single shadow kind of person, so this seemed like an easy home run. Sadly it misses the mark.   (1) Formulau2014 itu2019s creamy while applying, but it once it dries down it looks patchy and very, very dry. I saw lines on my face I didnu2019t know existed. I do not have this issue with shadows of any type, ever. It was an unflattering, uneven mess whether applied with the Merit brush or my fingers. I would not dream of using this as anything other than a liner, and even then, there are way better products.   (2) Color rangeu2014the color choices look extremely unflattering on some fairer skin tones, including the models in their ads. Based on Instagram swatches and reviews, it seems safe to say there is a large chunk of the population for whom the color range is not a safe bet. They need a few more neutral choices on both the fairer and deeper spectrum to suite all skin tones. These are not universal like they want you to believe.   (3) Merit did not invent the one and done shadow or the pot/cream shadow. Despite their strong insistence that theyu2019re innovating eyeshadow with this, theyu2019re not. Plenty of brands have released pot shadows in the last 25 years and my makeup drawer proves it. Merit, where have you been?   Also, do not let Merit gaslight you into thinking that eyeshadow palettes are just too u201ccomplicatedu201d for you. Youu2019re smart and capableu2014-you can handle the palette if you want it. Iu2019m all for single shadows, but please, Merit, drop the condescensionu2026.we know how to apply eyeshadow.   (4) The packaging is cheap. Like toy plastic feeling cheap. I expected more.   I hope this is a one off miss for the brand! Iu2019m the meantime, I plan to stick with my other singles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s been a few weeks that Iu2019ve been using  this solo eyeshadow in the shade of Midcentury, and I must say, itu2019s an absolute blast in the world of eyeshadows. This creamy eyeshadow delivers more than just a matte finish u2013 it presents a statement that is both bold and sophisticated. From the moment I applied this eyeshadow, I was blown away by its remarkable pigmentation. A little goes a long way, and the color payoff is truly outstanding. And another standout features of this eyeshadow is its impeccable longevity. I found that once applied, it stays firmly in place throughout the day, without losing its vibrancy or fading over time. Even in the face of daily activities, the color maintains its integrity until you decide to remove it. Speaking of removal, I was pleasantly surprised by how easily the eyeshadow comes off with makeup remover, providing a hassle-free experience at the end of the day. So if youu2019re looking for something that has a creamy texture, remarkable pigmentation, and enduring matte effect make these a must-have addition to your makeup collection. With this product, Merit has unquestionably raised the bar for quality eyeshadows, and Iu2019m excited to continue exploring their range of offerings in the future.
