reviews.review_text: I love the formula of this eye shadow so much! I love how it goes from a cream to a powder. Itu2019s such a pretty brown matte color that would look good on any + everyone! Iu2019m normally not a huge eyeshadow girl but you truly canu2019t mess this eyeshadow up!! You can apply with the No. 2 brush or with your finger which I love. This would be a great eyeshadow for a teen who is just starting out in makeup, for a mom that only has 5 minutes to do her makeup, and itu2019s even perfect for mature skin since it helps hide fine lines! Canu2019t recommend this eyeshadow enough!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am amazed at the texture of this product. It is Merit's signature easy to apply feel. It makes adding eyeshadow to your everyday look, a breeze!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love how simple this product is. Itu2019s such a staple eye look thatu2019s so easy to use. The formula is creamy, smooth and blendable. I also like that itu2019s not too thick. I wouldu2019ve given it 5 starts if I had grabbed a warmer shade but other than that itu2019s the perfect addition to make makeup bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay I know I was gifted this product but I am OBSESSED. I want every single color. Itu2019s SO creamy and blends seamlessly. I have it in the shade Midcentury and itu2019s the perfect color on me! This + Meritu2019s Brush No 2 is a must have!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a beautiful and neutral color great for all skin tones. It blends like a dream and pairs so well for a night out or a natural look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love that it's creamy but not too thick at all - and you can always blend + build! Super natural color on my eyes and easy to use, especially on most days when I don't have enough time to do my makeup. Also perfect to carry around for traveling!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this shadow itu2019s so pretty and so easy to put on. Definitely canu2019t wait to use it more in the fall

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm someone who used to love eyeshadow and owned dozens of full eyeshadow palettes back in my high school/early college days, but now that I've graduated I find myself wearing less makeup the earlier I have to get up, and eyeshadow is the one product I've kind of forgotten about. I haven't tried any eyeshadow or seen a new color I've been impressed by in years, but this cream to powder formula has me so excited to wear eyeshadow again! It's SO EASY, and it doesn't crease against my ultra oily eyelids (definitely need a primer though).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This olive shade is EVERYTHING for brown eyes. I did not expect to love a green shadow this much on me, but Viper is the perfect wearable pop of color. The shadow is soft & subtle, so itu2019s perfect for casual daily wear. If youu2019re looking for a more opaque look with no lift in color while building, this may not be the product for you u2014 but for the no makeup-makeup look lovers, Solo Shadow is a dream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Yum. This shadow is perfect for a non-shadow person. I get overwhelmed with placement and shading but this is just so easy to use and I love this warm bronzey color. Good last with minimal creasing. Going to get more colors for fall too :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite cream shadow! I have been trying to search for that u201cIG no eyeshadowu201d look and this is how I create it. Doesnu2019t crease or smudge either. Itu2019s best applied with the brush from the collection

reviews.review_title: Where was this product my whole life...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was used to just using my liquid bronzer as a tint to my eyelids, but this product...game changer. I love the light application it gives and the tint that I am always looking for!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love how blendable and easy this is to use! a perfect cool tone brown and can be used for a winged eyeliner as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this shadow for the past few weeks and became obsessed! I use the shade u201cMidcenturyu201d and it is just the perfect warm brown that Iu2019m able to use for an everyday look. I am usually pretty sensitive near my eyes but the formula is great and doesnu2019t irritate me. I love how easy the shadow blends and the texture is amazing. The best thing is that it doesnu2019t crease like other cream eyeshadows and I love that itu2019s buildable!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the application of this eyeshadow, it feels moisturizing and leaves a natural tint.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The formula was quite unique! I never tried a cream eyeshadow, so this was new. It blended in so effortlessly. However, you have to be fast with it because it does dry down a bit fast, and that just makes it a bit tacky and hard to blend out. I loved that you don't have to set your eyes with a base as well. I did receive the shade Midnight, which was a deep shade, so I am curious about the lighter shades. This is also perfect for creating a simple wing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was quite surprised at how pigmented this eyeshadow was. It has a soft, creamy texture to it. I used the double-sided brush to apply it to my lids and was able to use very little product to get it to my desired liking. It was easy to blend out as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eyeshadow is really nice because it is a cream to powder formula that lasts all day. The application of this product is one of best I have seen. It is so creamy and blends like a dream!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Merits formula is unmatched ! It's so creamy and blends out like a dream. When I'm in a rush - I just use my fingers to quickly swipe across my lids for a bit of shadow and natural dimension. Or using the duo brush - I'm able to build and blend out the color and smudge it along my lower lashes with the smaller side for more precision.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was able to get my hands on this product a little early and have been testing it quite a bit. Iu2019m new to cream eyeshadows, but this product makes using them so easy! It really is so easy to blend and it applies so beautifully!

Easy to apply and the pigmentation is amazing ! I love the creamy yet powdery texture. Iu2019ve used this product a couple of times now, and I love how great it looks on my eyes. I am literally OBSESSED !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This eyeshadow is perfect for my minimal makeup days as an all over lid colour or to use as a subtle eyeliner! It applies as a cream and is super easy to blend out, but dries as a powder. I have oily eyelids so it did transfer a little, but stayed on all night. I also love the packaging, it's so pretty and the jar clicks to lock so it wonu2019t open in my makeup bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using the shade Brun and I absolutely love this shade!! I typically add bronzer to my eyelids everyday for my makeup routine and now I have found the perfect single shadow to replace that! Definitely recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have the cool taupe colour and absolutely love this shade. I have a nice Sunkissed glow, and this colour was flawless. It stayed on all day, and zero creasing or moving of any kind. Definitely the best eyeshadow Iu2019ve ever tried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this shadow! Pigmented and so easy to blend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this new shadow in brun, which is a neutral deep brown color, both with my finger and a brush. I love the cream to powder texture, which makes it easy to blend out. Lately, I've been using to softly line my eyes using a precision brush. It's pigmented but not too dark!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely adore this new eyeshadow! The product itself is extremely creamy and it has the perfect, natural finish. It was so easy to apply and I look forward to buying more shades because this is quickly becoming a staple in my makeup routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the creme to powder formula and the easy application! this product is stunning and certified clean!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is very forgiving and works well as a natural eye shadow. I wear it to work everyday. It is quick and easy to apply and also very flattering!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think this product would be great for someone who has a more oily complexion but wants to use cream products. I personally like dewy products but this was still really easy and nice to use! If you are starting your makeup collection this is a foolproof cream product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The product itself was very creamy! Itu2019s perfect as a base for your eyeshadows- especially if youu2019re doing a natural Smokey eye! It lasted me for about 10 hours and didnu2019t budge!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t usually wear eyeshadow but merit always make it easy to use their products! You can use your fingers or the shadow brush and it will blend perfectly! Added this to my car makeup bag for on the go glam!

reviews.review_title: Must have in my daily makeup routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm really loving the new Merit eyeshadows. They are finely made and apply very creamy to the lid. I've used them both with and without a primer and noticed that the eyeshadows have long lasting power even without a primer. The neutral colors are perfect and easy for a quick five minute look.

reviews.review_title: If I could give this shadow 10 stars I would
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not an eyeshadow wearer by any means. I have a pretty natural approach to make up, especially eye makeup since I have large eyes and feel a lot of times makeup accentuates them too much to the point where they aren't natural (I don't even wear mascara for that reason). This eyeshadow has forever changed me!!!! I've worn it every day as a new staple in my makeup routine. It's so natural, but effective. I matched the shade to my complexion stick shade and it is the perfect color- it really accentuates the green in my hazel eyes. Never realized I could love an eyeshadow this much!!! Will never go a day without it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: this is such a great product. though its really creamy the pigment is insane. it definitely adds a little dazzle to a minimalistic look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried this shadow and I must say, I'm impressed! This eye shadow truly exceeded my expectations in every way.  First and foremost, the color selection is amazing and perfect for a night out. Texture-wise, this shadow is a dream to work with. It's smooth and velvety, making application a breeze. I'm pretty minimal usually when it comes to makeup, and this product aligns with that.
I love this eyeshadow! Truly so impressed with the application and love how buildable you can make it. So creamy and blends smoothly. Canu2019t wait to try more shades.

reviews.review_title: Great for a bronze Smokey eye - so easy!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Such an easy shadow to apply. Love how it just warms up my easy for a bronze smokey eye. Perfect for when you want something a little extra but don't want the hassle of a whole-eye palette. The shadow also lasts all day. I used with and without setting spray and didn't see a crease or smudge when I used solo. Really enjoying, hope to pick-up in other colors.

reviews.review_title: Great Alone or as a Base
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is another win from Merit Beauty. I got this to try before the launch and I was honestly really impressed. Cream shadows arent a big deal for me but this one is so buttery, can be used as a standalone or as a beautiful base for any look. I recently used this on a briadl client as her base for the rest of the shadows and it blended evrrything so beautifully. I highly recommend getting this if you are a beginner to eyeshadow and want something quick and easyeith beautiful results.

reviews.review_title: Perfect for a smudgey smokey eye
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The shade minimally applied is perfect everyday eyes and buildable enough for the sultry evening looks, i love this shade for a good smudged brown eyeliner look

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i have the shade midcentury itu2019s super pretty and looks amazing on

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been trying this eyeshadow for almost two weeks now and Iu2019m in love, the texture is so soft. I love that is very easy to blend and looks amazing. This color is so cute.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So easy to use! I rarely use eyeshadow anymore since it always feels intimidating or tedious, especially when I want to do something minimal. This is super easy and blendable. I really only use my fingers and I swipe a bit across my eyelids for a more soft & sultry look for the evening.  I got the Viper - warm green color because I wanted to try a soft smoky eye every now and then, without have to whip out all these eyeshadow palettes and brushes, and then worry about fallout when applying. I like that it's matte without any creases, and the color is perfect for my olive-skin tone, without looking too dark and heavy.

reviews.review_title: Canu2019t wait to try more shades!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time using a cream to powder eyeshadow and I was so impressed! The color is so rich and blends nicely with their shadow brush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have this product in midcentury and love how easy it is to blend and use. It is very natural looking, so I even wear it on days when I wear minimal to no makeup just to add a pop of color. The texture and color are both very nice!

reviews.review_title: It actually shows up in just one stroke!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The pigmentation is so nice in this one! I love this shade so much. It's so easy to apply and I love how cute the packaging is too. Because I have monolids, I usually don't really wear eyeshadow as it doesn't flatter me. But this one shows up so well and I think it compliments my daily makeup look every day! (In the photo, I don't have any lash makeup on to show you the full eyeshadow <3) If I run out of this, I'll definitely need to buy it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i love this eyeshadow! it blends very well and is easy to apply. definitely will be repurchasing in more colors!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This shadow is like if you had a primer, a shadow, and setting spray in one. It lasts ALL DAY, how you wish your powder shadow would. Itu2019s a balmy formula that sets into a powdery soft matte. The neutral shades give the perfect soft wash of colour, and the deeper shades work so well for a smudged out smoky eye that stays put. You can apply with your finger if you want to build the colour up, but I find it works best with the fluffy side of the No. 2 brush to buff out the edges, but be sure to work quick!! I also love the ultra luxe packaging. Itu2019s a win for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Incredibly easy to use & blend out- some cream shadows get patchy, dry down too quickly, and can be hard to work with, but this one is none of those things. I think the wear time is much better if you prime your eyes (that's really my only criticism, because it can fade somewhat quickly if you don't use anything with it), but other than that it's so beautiful. I definitely give it 5 stars for everyday wear as the most beautiful wash of color. This specific shade too couldn't match me better for my perfect everyday neutral brown- it's right in between cool and warm (I'm fair-light skin tone). Would love to try more shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The shade Studio is a beautiful taupe color! I'm impressed with how smooth the consistency is, it is not grainy at all. Using my finger or Brush No. 2, the shadow was very easy to blend and lasted all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: used this when getting ready for work, super quick, easy and blendable. this is perfect for beginners like myself to just put on one colour and still looks good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A cream eye shadow you think is pretty basic, but not this one. Iu2019m blow away with the buildable pigmentation and the way this blend out so effortlessly, it leaves me with the perfect soft blown out definition on my eyes I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this eyeshadow. This shade social is so pretty! The formula is very smooth and it has good pigment. I love how you can wear this daily or for a night out. It is a new staple in my makeup routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this eyeshadow! Itu2019s so pretty and easy to blend out using the merit eyeshadow brush. Iu2019m horrible at eyeshadow but using this I feel like a pro. I love using this as a base and then applying a glitter topper to elevate my looks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It is SO smooth and blends gorgeously! I love the soft brown color that I got - itu2019s perfect for an easy every day wear! I canu2019t wait to get more colors. :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have really been leaning into minimalist beauty this year, and this merit beauty solo shadow pot is my favorite new stable item. The cream to powder formula blends, so seamlessly on my face, and Iu2019ve actually started using this shade all over my eyebrow arches and cheekbones. Itu2019s a warm, settle glow to my face and I donu2019t have to carry a ton of products around.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a gorgeous pigmented color I love it!! It stays on for sooo long and it is super easy to apply it when you use their Brush No. 2. This is such an everyday colour that I could see myself using anytime.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smooth and silky. Blends very well. Smudges perfectly. Use the brush they sell for best results!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love that this is a cream base. Applies smoothly. Itu2019s very light so itu2019s a perfect everyday look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very nice and buildable eyeshadow, very easy to use and it gives you a soft look. You can use their new Brush No. 2 which makes it easy to apply. I like that you only need a little bit and the pigment shows well. This shade is great if you want a neutral look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The sleek and beautiful packaging makes my makeup routine experience more luxurious. I really enjoyed how buildable the formula is as well as how it doesn't enhance any fine lines and instead creates a matte blurred filter effect. I would recommend this color for date nights or fall/winter season. I would recommend this as a gift as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been including this product in my routine for a while now and I am really loving it. It blends really nicely and has great pigment!

reviews.review_title: a wearable green eyeshadow for everyday
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the packaging is so luxe, and this shade of green is so easy to wear for everyday use. I like to apply it as a shadow with my fingertips and I use the brush no. 2 (narrow end) to use it as a fun liner. so pretty and lasts all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this eyeshadow! The color is so nice, the texture is great, and the packing is perfection :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is pretty beautiful. I find it really easy to work with and the shade Nelson specifically is really great for those who love an easy smoky eye. However, my oily eyelids eat this up and make it super creasy, which is actually a look I personally really love and think is sexy but I definitely know it's not for everyone. If you have dry eyelids I doubt that will be as much as an is of an issue. I found the product really easy to blend out and pack on to build intensity. I don't really love the component. It feels a little cheap. It is plastic and not weighted.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eyeshadow is now a must have in my routine! The cream to powder formula is so easy to blend and lasts all day! 10/10 from me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My new everyday eyeshadow! I love how natural it looks and it stays all day!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have many Merit products and this is the first one I did not enjoy. The product did not glide nicely on my eyelids; however, the colours stayed all day without creasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product! I have been using this in the shade 'studio' and I love how the color matches with my skin tone! This product applies so easily, especially when applying it using Brush no. 2!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: There are only a few products that will leave you speechless and this is truly one of them! This solo shadow has changed the game of eye-shadow and as someone who struggles with creating a good eye look; I love how easy this solo shadow is to use. It's the perfect transition from cream to powder which makes it so easy to blend. It's so easy to use with just your finger or pair it with the Merit Brush No. 2 that blends out the shadow so effortlessly. It's the perfect size to take on the go - which I prefer over large pallets. I can't wait to get my hands on the other colors!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely obsessed with the cream brown eyeshadow! The texture is incredibly smooth and blends like a dream. The rich brown shade adds depth and dimension to my eyes, making them pop in the most stunning way. Whether I'm going for a natural everyday look or a sultry, smoky eye, this eyeshadow never disappoints. The long-lasting formula stays put all day without creasing or fading, ensuring that my eye makeup looks flawless from morning to night. Plus, the compact packaging makes it super convenient for on-the-go touch-ups. Trust me, this cream brown eyeshadow is a must-have in any makeup collection!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Solo Shadow Cream-to-Powder Soft Matte Eyeshadow in the shade Vachetta complimentary from MERIT in exchange for my honest review. I love how compact the solo shadow is. And may I add, a big factor for me is the presentation and quality of the product. MERIT invested in this packaging because it is so luxe and it is a great size. Not mini at all. I love the formula, it is so creamy, I should add that it tends to start setting and drying fairly quickly for me. So take that in consideration. Vachetta is a nice neutral color for an everyday pop of color-in a neutral way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this shadow is great. Itu2019s perfect for on the go, it creamy and not messy. This shadow glides on to my eye when applied, you can even use your finger. Perfect eyeshadow out there. Packaging is great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This soft mauve is perfect for that pop of muted color for a soft smoky eye or keep it simple and do a wash of color. I absolutely adore this cream to powder formula as it is easy to work with, no fallout to worry about. The cream spreads easily and easy to buff out.  I canu2019t wait to pick up more shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've finally met my match with the solo eyeshadows. The cream formula is super creamy, emollient and glides across the lids. It has lightweight feel in which you feel would apply sheer, but it is creates a soft burst of color to the lids and is buildable. The formula is easy to blend out and build to your satisfaction, but once it has dried down and set, surprisingly it stays put rather well and can't be rubbed off easily. I was quite impressed how well it stay put because a lot of cream shadows I've used in the past, can easily be rubbed off or the oil on my lids breaks them down by mid morning. The formula of these are hydrating and easy to work with no matter your skill level. It's easy to blend out; you never have to worry about going overboard and your eye look resulting with racoon eyes. These are perfect for creating one shade eye looks or I imagine could be combined with other shades as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful color, applies evenly and smooth not blotchy. 10/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this product! I usually like putting bronzer on my lids and this is better than that. Itu2019s a cream to powder formula, looks great , blends like a dream and stays on the eyes all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful colour for blue eyes. A fabulous base eyeshadow for everyday or as a starting point to build on with other solo shadows. I love the packaging- very easy to travel with.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cream-to-powder formula is a dreamu2026. literally the ultimate eyeshadow for those who hate the time for blending. The formulation is smooth and not irritating to my sensitive skin! LOVE LOVE

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: These past few weeks, I've been testing this on all occasions in my life. Luckily, I can confirm that it's versatile and has long lasting power. I have hooded eyelids and the problems I have with eyeshadows, especially for medium-darker tones of browns and black, it has a tendency to transfer on where my skin folds. Luckily, the innovation of this formula allows it to not to transfer! This formula is unique because it applies and glides easily with both brushers and fingers with a customizable pigment pay off. From a soft wash of colour to an intensified smoldering eye, this was fantastic to achieve any mood and the finish almost merges with your skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you are looking for a base for your Latte Makeup, this is it! The formula is absolutely incredible, so easy to blend because is a cream to powder eyeshadow. The shade is very warm, looks really good on my Latina light to medium skin tone. I have tons of cream eyeshadow, but this one is really something else. Iu2019m so glad for the opportunity to try it before was released.

Definitely have to play around with this a bit more to figure out the perfect amount of product. This blended like a dream but donu2019t pack on too much at first or else youu2019re in for a BOLD look hahaha I love the cream to matte finish but still need to work on application!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Being new to cream shadows, I did take a few days to play with this before composing my thoughts. Iu2019d say if you never used a cream shadow before, there is a little bit of a learning curve, especially with how much you want to load your brush at first. I made a mistake of putting too much on first application. But once I figured that out, I really enjoyed this shadow! Itu2019s a nice buildable color, easy to blend with a good brush. The lasting power is really good! I almost always get creases in normal shadows, but this felt like it almost blended into my skin, not showing creases. I also really like the shade Vachetta. I feel like it could work on my skin tone as a contour for my nose as well, but will have to try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm extremely impressed with MERT's Solo shadow. I must say how it makes my brown eyes pop. First impression, the packaging is sleek and minimalist yet gives a luxurious feel with the gold lid that locks into place, which enables the product not to dry out.   The shade viper is a soft matte warm green shade that'll complement all skin tones after swatching the shade onto my lids. it's not bright and cool, making it the perfect green wearable shade for the daytime for an evening out.  Application is super easy. You can use MERIT superior quality brush Brush No. 2 a dual ended brush to diffuse color across the lid or the tapered end to apply shadow along the lash line. I'm happy to say that solo shadow applies easily with the finger. all you need is one swipe and pat down into the lid and crease area. I've noticed that it's completely safe to use in the waterline area without irritation. But if you have very sensitive eye refrain from it.   I can appreciate how the formula is buildable, doesn't settle into crease or texture, has a cream-to-powder finish,  is budge free, and will seriously last the entire day. Just blend shadow out quickly it dries down beautifully. Once eyeshadow is in place, it doesn't crease or crack.  don't forget to use an eyeshadow Primer that works for you.   Solo shadow is formulated with super clean and good for the skin ingredients.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The casing is to die for, cap twists in place, a beautiful reflecting gold. I was expecting a powder shadow but lo and behold it's actually a cream shadow! It does't not leave any residue. Viper is a great shade for a person with olive skin like me and dark or light brown eyes. I love that I can create many different looks with the dual tip brush. Only reason I do not give it 5 stars is because it's a little hard to apply over your lids as it tugs a bit, I'd suggest using a creamy primer or some sort of moisturizer before applying, or using a doe foot brush with a tapping motion. It works perfectly as an eyeliner but not so much so as a creamy eyeshadow. On a positive note it does last all day for that same reason! Won't smudge or crease.

I love it because itu2019s not as harsh as black would be and I think a little more interesting to look at than brown. The only thing I would recommend is to do one eye at a time so you have time to blend it out before it sets! Definitely will be getting a few more shades.
